S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.48_0: ahaṃ cimāśco bahuprāṇakoṭya iha sthitāḥ paśyiṣu sarvametat /

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.52_0: kimarthameṣaḥ sugatena adya prabhāsa etādṛśako vimuktaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:16_0_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:16_1_1: ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:16_1_2: ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:16_3: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt,
S04bsu036_u:16_5: tenaivaṃ prajānāmi - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ tathāgataḥ kartukāmo mahādharmaśravaṇaṃ śrāvayitukāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:17_0_1: parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma [Vaidya_12]
S04bsu036_u:17_0_2: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:17_0_3: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:17_1: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:17_2: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:17_3_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu036_u:17_4: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:18_0_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu036_u:18_0_1: pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka
S04bsu036_u:18_1_0: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
S04bsu036_u:18_2: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat paścimakastathāgataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:18_3_0: so 'pi candrasūryapradīpanāmadheya eva tathāgato 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu036_u:18_3_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho
S04bsu036_u:18_4: so 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:18_5: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:18_6_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān
S04bsu036_u:18_7: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:19_0: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:19_3: anantamatiśca nāma, ratnamatiśca nāma, viśeṣamatiśca nāma, vimatisamuddhāṭī ca nāma, ghoṣamatiśca nāma, dharmamatiśca nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:19_4: teṣāṃ khalu punarajita aṣṭānāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyaputrāṇāṃ vipularddhirabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:19_7: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:19_9: sadā ca brahmacāriṇo bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāśca te rājakumārā abhuvan /
S04bsu036_u:20_0_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu036_u:20_0_1: mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
S04bsu036_u:20_0_2: bhāṣitvā [Vaidya_13] tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte tasminneva
S04bsu036_u:20_0_3: mahādharmāsane paryaṅkamābhujya anantanirdeśapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno
S04bsu036_u:20_1: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punastasya bhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
S04bsu036_u:20_3: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam /
S04bsu036_u:20_4_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
S04bsu036_u:20_6: te sarve saparivārāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:20_7: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /
S04bsu036_u:20_9: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:20_10: tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu036_u:21_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan /
S04bsu036_u:21_2: te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ kautūhalasamutpannā etena mahāraśmyavabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu036_u:22_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:22_2: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:22_3: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena kāyena aniñjamānena cittena /
S04bsu036_u:22_4: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:22_5: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:23_0_1: taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
S04bsu036_u:23_0_3: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:23_0_4: purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S04bsu036_u:24_0_0: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:24_0_1: nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ
S04bsu036_u:24_0_2: parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ
S04bsu036_u:25_0: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:25_1: taṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān /
S04bsu036_u:25_2: aśītiṃ cāntarakalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:25_3: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:25_6: taiśca tataḥ paścādbahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭāni satkṛtāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:26_0: teṣāṃ ca aṣṭānāmantevāsiśatānāmeko bodhisattvo 'dhimātraṃ lābhaguruko 'bhūt satkāraguruko jñātaguruko yaśaskāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:26_4: ārāgayitvā ca satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitānyarcitānyapacāyitāni /
S04bsu036_u:26_5: syātkhalu punaste ajita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:26_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:26_9: tvameva ajita sa tena kālena tena samayena yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:26_10: iti hi ajita ahamanena paryāyeṇedaṃ bhagavataḥ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpāṃ raśmimutsṛṣṭāmevaṃ parimīmāṃse,
S04bsu036_u:26_11: yathā bhagavānapi taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:27_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.57_1: yadā jino āsi prajāna uttamaścandrasya sūryasya pradīpa nāma //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.58_0: saddharma deśeti prajāna nāyako vineti sattvāna anantakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.59_0: ye cāṣṭa putrāstada tasya āsan kumārabhūtasya vināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.59_1: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pravrajitaṃ mahāmuniṃ jahitva kāmāṃllaghu sarvi prāvrajan //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.60_0: dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.61_0: samanantaraṃ bhāṣiya so vināyakaḥ paryaṅka bandhitva kṣaṇasmi tasmin /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.62_1: devāśca yakṣāśca sthitāntarīkṣe kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.63_0: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.63_1: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.64_0: pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.64_1: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.65_0: ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
S04bsu036_u:28_0: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.66_0: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.66_2: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.67_0: buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.67_1: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.68_0: tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.68_1: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.69_1: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.70_1: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.71_0: aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.71_1: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.72_0: bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.73_0: dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.73_1: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.74_0: acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.74_1: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.75_0: lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.75_1: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.76_1: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.77_0: yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.77_1: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.78_0: so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.78_1: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.79_0: prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.79_1: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.80_0: bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_1.80_1: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt //

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.22_0: niḥsaṃśayaṃ bheṣyi tathāgato 'haṃ puraskṛto loki sadevake 'smin /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.22_1: saṃghāya vakṣye imu buddhabodhiṃ samādapento bahubodhisattvān //
S04bsu036_u:71_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - ārocayāmi te śāriputra,
S04bsu036_u:71_1: prativedayāmi te asya sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:71_2: mayā tvaṃ śāriputra viṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike paripācito 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:71_4: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasaṃmantritena bodhisattvarahasyena iha mama pravacane upapannaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:71_5: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānena tatpaurvakaṃ caryāpraṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasaṃmantritaṃ bodhisattvarahasyaṃ na samanusmarasi /
S04bsu036_u:71_6_1: imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
S04bsu036_u:72_0_0: api khalu punaḥ śāriputra, bhaviṣyasi tvamanāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairacintyairapramāṇairbahūnāṃ
S04bsu036_u:72_0_1: tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayitvā vividhāṃ ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā imāmeva
S04bsu036_u:72_0_2: bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya padmaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke
S04bsu036_u:72_0_4: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:73_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena tasya bhagavataḥ padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu036_u:73_0_1: virajaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ paramasudarśanīyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:73_0_2: pariśuddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca bahujananārīgaṇākīrṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:73_1: teṣu ca aṣṭāpadeṣu ratnavṛkṣā bhaviṣyanti saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ puṣpaphalaiḥ satatasamitaṃ samarpitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:74_0: so 'pi śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastrīṇyeva yānānyārabhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:74_1: kiṃcāpi śāriputra sa tathāgato na kalpakaṣāya utpatsyate,
S04bsu036_u:74_3: mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaśca nāma śāriputra sa kalpo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:74_4: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate? ratnāni śāriputra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā ucyante /
S04bsu036_u:74_5: te tasmin kāle tasyāṃ virajāyāṃ lokadhātau bahavo bodhisattvā bhaviṣyantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā amāpyā gaṇanāṃ samatikrāntā anyatra tathāgatagaṇanayā /
S04bsu036_u:74_6: tena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate /
S04bsu036_u:75_0: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena bodhisattvāstasmin buddhakṣetre yadbhūyasā ratnapadmavikrāmiṇo bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:75_3: tathāgataparisaṃstutā buddhajñānābhiyuktā mahābhijñāparikarmanirjātāḥ sarvadharmanayakuśalā mārdavāḥ smṛtimantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:75_4: bhūyiṣṭhena śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paripūrṇaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:76_0: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya dvādaśāntarakalpā āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā kumārabhūtatvam /
S04bsu036_u:76_2: sa ca śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato dvādaśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena dhṛtiparipūrṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau parinirvāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:76_3: ayaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtiparipūrṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu036_u:76_4_0: padmavṛṣabhavikrāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu036_u:76_4_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho
S04bsu036_u:76_5: tasyāpi śāriputra padmavṛṣabhavikrāmiṇastathāgatasya evaṃrūpameva buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:77_0: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:77_1: tatastasya tasmin saddharme kṣīṇe dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmapratirūpakaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:78_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:78_1: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.23_0: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.24_0: bahubuddhakoṭīṣu karitva satkriyāṃ caryābalaṃ tatra upārjayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.24_1: utpādayitvā ca daśo balāni spṛśiṣyase uttamamagrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.25_0: acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe prabhūtaratnastada kalpu bheṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.25_1: virajā ca nāmnā tada lokadhātuḥ kṣetraṃ viśuddhaṃ dvipadottamasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.27_1: ye śikṣitā buddhaśateṣu caryāṃ te tatra kṣetre upapadya santi //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.29_0: sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.29_1: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.30_0: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.30_1: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.31_0: saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.31_1: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.32_0: etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_3.32_1: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:79_0_2: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:79_1: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:79_4: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma /
S04bsu036_u:79_5: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:79_6: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:79_7: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:81_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - niṣkāṅkṣo 'smi bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:81_1_0: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni
S04bsu036_u:81_1_1: evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ
S04bsu036_u:81_2_0: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:81_4: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:82_0_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
S04bsu036_u:82_0_2: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ
S04bsu036_u:82_2: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham /
S04bsu036_u:82_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? upamayā iha ekatyā vijñapuruṣā bhāṣitasyārthamājānanti /
S04bsu036_u:83_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade
S04bsu036_u:83_0_1: vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo
S04bsu036_u:83_1: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:83_3: tṛṇasaṃchannaṃ ca bhavet / vigalitaprāsādaṃ ca bhavet / pūtistambhamūlaṃ ca bhavet / saṃśīrṇakuḍyakaṭalepanaṃ ca bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:83_4: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:83_5: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā /
S04bsu036_u:84_0: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt
S04bsu036_u:84_2: evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ nirdhāvitum /
S04bsu036_u:84_3: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
S04bsu036_u:84_4: imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti nodvegamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:84_5: saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti,
S04bsu036_u:85_0: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:85_2: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:85_3: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva /
S04bsu036_u:85_7: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:85_10: anayavyasanamāpatsyatha / atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:85_12: nāpi jānanti na vijānanti kimetadādīptaṃ nāmeti /
S04bsu036_u:86_0: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam /
S04bsu036_u:86_1: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:86_4: adhimuktiṃ ca vijānīyāt / teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni,
S04bsu036_u:87_0: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
S04bsu036_u:87_1: yeṣāmalābhāt saṃtapyatha, nānāvarṇāni bahuprakārāṇi / tadyathā gorathakānyajarathakāni mṛgarathakāni /
S04bsu036_u:87_3: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:87_5: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:87_8_0: nirdhāvata / atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:87_8_1: yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā tasmādādīptādagārāt
S04bsu036_u:87_8_2: kṣipramevārabdhavīryā balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:88_0: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:88_1: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman,
S04bsu036_u:88_2: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta tāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu036_u:88_4_0: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān [Vaidya_53]
S04bsu036_u:88_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca /
S04bsu036_u:88_7: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmanyairyānairdattairiti /
S04bsu036_u:88_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarva evaite kumārakā mamaiva putrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:88_9: sarve ca me priyā manaāpāḥ / saṃvidyante ca me imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāyānāni /
S04bsu036_u:88_10: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam /
S04bsu036_u:88_14: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:88_15: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt,
S04bsu036_u:88_16: yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:89_1: na hyetat sugata / anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:89_2: jīvitena ca abhicchāditāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāvapratilambhenaiva bhagavan sarvakrīḍanakāni labdhāni bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:89_3: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:89_4: tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:89_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:89_6: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:89_7: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:89_8: yaduta mahāyānāni / nāsti bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:90_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S04bsu036_u:90_1_0: evametacchāriputra, evametad yathā vadasi / evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S04bsu036_u:90_5: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:90_6: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:90_7: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:90_9_0: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti
S04bsu036_u:90_9_1: na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:90_11: tena tenaiva vidhāvanti / tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti /

S04bsu036_u:110_7: visaṃjñaśca syāt / āsanne cāsya sa pitā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:110_8: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti /
S04bsu036_u:110_9: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet /
S04bsu036_u:110_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? jānāti sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya hīnādhimuktikatāmātmanaścodārasthāmatām /
S04bsu036_u:111_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet - mamaiṣa putra iti /
S04bsu036_u:111_1: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:111_2: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:111_3: mukto 'si / evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:111_4: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:111_5: mukto 'sīti / atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:111_6: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:111_8: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:111_9: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām /
S04bsu036_u:111_10: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:111_11: sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ - saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ sahāvābhyāmiti /
S04bsu036_u:111_12: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām /
S04bsu036_u:111_13: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:111_14: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:111_15: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam /
S04bsu036_u:112_0: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
S04bsu036_u:112_3: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:112_5: mā tiṣṭhata, harata pāṃsūni / anenopāyena taṃ putramālapet saṃlapecca /
S04bsu036_u:112_6: enaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva /
S04bsu036_u:112_7: mā bhūyo 'nyatra gamiṣyasi / saviśeṣaṃ te 'haṃ vetanakaṃ dāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:112_8: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:112_9: tadviśrabdhaṃ māṃ yāceḥ, yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena /
S04bsu036_u:112_11: sacettayā te kāryaṃ syāt, yāceḥ, ahaṃ te 'nupradāsyāmi / yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa,
S04bsu036_u:112_14: yādṛśaste pitā, tādṛśaste 'haṃ mantavyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ [Vaidya_74] ca vṛddhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:112_15: tvaṃ ca daharaḥ / mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā /
S04bsu036_u:112_16: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:112_17: karoṣi vā / sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
S04bsu036_u:112_18: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
S04bsu036_u:112_19: yādṛśo me putra aurasaḥ, tādṛśastvaṃ mama adyāgreṇa bhavasi /
S04bsu036_u:113_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:113_2: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:113_3: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
S04bsu036_u:114_0: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:114_1: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet /
S04bsu036_u:114_2: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:114_4: ahaṃ bāḍhaglānaḥ / icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:114_5: sarvaṃ saṃjānīyāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yādṛśa eva ahamasya dravyasya svāmī,
S04bsu036_u:114_6: tādṛśastvamapi / mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi /
S04bsu036_u:115_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:116_0_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā
S04bsu036_u:116_0_1: avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:116_0_2: jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato
S04bsu036_u:116_0_3: jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ
S04bsu036_u:116_1: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:116_2: amukaṃ nāma nagaram / tasmādeṣa pañcāśadvarṣo naṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:116_3: amuko nāmaiṣa nāmnā / ahamapyamuko nāma / tataścāhaṃ nagarādetameva mārgamāṇa ihāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:116_4: eṣa mama putraḥ, ahamasya pitā / yaḥ kaścinmamopabhogo 'sti, taṃ sarvamasmai puruṣāya niryātayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:117_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:117_1: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti /
S04bsu036_u:118_1: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:118_2: yathā sa gṛhapatiḥ / vayaṃ ca bhagavaṃstisṛbhirduḥkhatābhiḥ saṃpīḍitā abhūma /
S04bsu036_u:118_3: katamābhistisṛbhiḥ? yaduta duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
S04bsu036_u:118_4: saṃsāre ca hīnādhimuktikāḥ / tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:118_6: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:118_7: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:118_8: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
S04bsu036_u:118_11: na saṃbhinatti, nācaṣṭe - yo 'yaṃ tathāgatasya jñānakośaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:118_14: niḥspṛhāśca vayaṃ bhagavan / tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:118_15: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:118_19: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:118_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
S04bsu036_u:118_25: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:119_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.1_0: āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.1_1: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.2_2: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.3_0: yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.3_1: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.4_0: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.4_1: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.5_0: tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.5_1: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.6_0: bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.6_1: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.7_0: prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.7_1: susatkṛtaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭibhī rājñaśca so vallabhu nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.8_0: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.8_1: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.9_0: etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.9_1: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.10_0: sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.10_1: ayaṃ ca kośo vipulo mamāsti kālakriyā co mama pratyupasthitā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.11_0: so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.11_1: grāmeṇa grāmaṃ anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta athāpi colam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.12_0: paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.12_1: sa śuṣyate paraśaraṇeṣu bālo dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdhagātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.13_0: so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.13_1: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.14_0: so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.15_0: āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.15_1: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.16_0: so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.16_1: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:121_0: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.17_0: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.17_2: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.18_0: so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.18_1: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.19_0: samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.19_1: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.20_0: dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.20_1: na śraddadhī mahyamimāṃ vibhūṣitāṃ pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.21_0: puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.21_1: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.22_1: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.23_0: etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.24_0: so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.24_1: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.25_0: sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.25_1: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.26_0: dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.26_1: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.27_0: evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.27_1: suṣṭhuṃ khalū karma karoṣi atra putro 'si vyaktaṃ mama nātra saṃśayaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.28_0: sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.28_1: viṃśacca varṣāṇi supūritāni krameṇa viśrambhayi taṃ naraṃ saḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.29_0: hiraṇyu so mauktiku sphāṭikaṃ ca pratisāmayettatra niveśanasmin /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.29_1: sarvaṃ ca so saṃgaṇanāṃ karoti arthaṃ ca sarvaṃ anucintayeta //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.30_0: bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.30_1: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.31_0: jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.32_2: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.33_0: pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.33_1: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.34_0: sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.34_1: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.35_1: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.36_1: na śrāvitaṃ buddha bhaviṣyatheti yūyaṃ kila śrāvaka mahya putrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.37_0: asmāṃśca adhyeṣati lokanātho ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.37_1: teṣāṃ vade kāśyapa mārga nuttaraṃ yaṃ mārga bhāvitva bhaveyu buddhāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.38_0: vayaṃ ca teṣāṃ sugatena preṣitā bahubodhisattvāna mahābalānām /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_4.39_0: śrutvā ca asmāku jinasya putrā bodhāya bhāventi sumārgamagryam /

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.44_0: paramārtha evaṃ mayaṃ bhūtabhāṣito te śrāvakāḥ sarvi na enti nirvṛtim /

S04bsu036_u:131_0: punaraparaṃ kāśyapa tathāgataḥ sattvavinaye samo na cāsamaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:131_1: tadyathā kāśyapa candrasuryaprabhā sarvalokamavabhāsayati kuśalakāriṇamakuśalakāriṇaṃ cordhvāvasthitamadharāvasthitaṃ ca sugandhi durgandhi,
S04bsu036_u:131_2: sā sarvatra samaṃ prabhā nipatati na viṣamam,
S04bsu036_u:131_3_0: evameva kāśyapa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñajñānacittaprabhā sarveṣu
S04bsu036_u:131_4: na ca tathāgatasya jñānaprabhāyā ūnatā vā atiriktatā vā yathāpuṇyajñānasamudāgamāya saṃbhavati /
S04bsu036_u:132_0: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadi bhagavan na santi trīṇi yānāni,
S04bsu036_u:132_1_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne 'dhvani śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptiḥ prajñapyate?
S04bsu036_u:132_1_1: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat - tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ
S04bsu036_u:132_3: kānicid ghṛtabhājanāni, kānicid dadhikṣīrabhājanāni, kānicid hīnānyaśucibhājanāni bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:132_4: na ca mṛttikāyā nānātvam, atha ca dravyaprakṣepamātreṇa bhājanānāṃ nānātvaṃ prajñāyate /
S04bsu036_u:132_5: evameva kāśyapa ekamevedaṃ yānaṃ yaduta buddhayānam /
S04bsu036_u:132_6: na dvitīyaṃ na tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu036_u:133_0: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadyapi bhagavan sattvā nānādhimuktayo ye traidhātukānniḥsṛtāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:133_1: kiṃ teṣāmekaṃ nirvāṇamuta dve trīṇi vā? bhagavānāha - sarvadharmasamatāvabodhāddhi kāśyapa nirvāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:133_2: taccaikam, na dve na trīṇi / tena hi kāśyapa upamāṃ te kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:133_5: sa evaṃ brūyānna santi suvarṇadurvaṇāni rūpāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:133_7: na staḥ sūryācandramasau, na santi nakṣatrāṇi, na santi grahāḥ, na santi grahāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:133_8: athānye puruṣāstasya jātyandhasya puruṣasya purata evaṃ vadeyuḥ - santi suvarṇadurvarṇāni rūpāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:133_10: staḥ sūryācandramasau, santi nakṣatrāṇi, santi grahāḥ, santi grahāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ / sa ca jātyandhaḥ puruṣasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na śraddadhyāt,
S04bsu036_u:133_11: noktaṃ gṛhṇīyāt / atha kaścid vaidyaḥ sarvavyādhijñaḥ syāt /
S04bsu036_u:133_13: tasyaivaṃ syāt - tasya puruṣasya pūrvapāpena karmaṇā vyādhirutpannaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:133_15: te sarve caturvidhāḥ - vātikāḥ paittikāḥ ślaiḥmikāḥ sāṃnipātikāśca /
S04bsu036_u:133_16: atha sa vaidyastasya vyādhervyupaśamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarupāyaṃ cintayet /
S04bsu036_u:133_17: tasyaivaṃ syāt - yāni khalvimāni dravyāṇi pracaranti,
S04bsu036_u:133_19: santi tu himavati parvatarāje catasra oṣadhayaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:133_24: imāścatasraḥ oṣadhayaḥ / atha sa vaidyastasmin jātyandhe kāruṇyamutpādya tādṛśamupāyaṃ cintayet,
S04bsu036_u:133_26: gatvā cordhvamapyārohet, adho 'pyavataret, tiryagapipravicinuyāt / sa evaṃ pravicinvaṃstāścatasra oṣadhīrārāgayet /
S04bsu036_u:133_27: ārāgya ca kāṃciddantaiḥ kṣoditāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:133_28: kāṃcit peṣayitvā dadyāt, kāṃcidanyadravyasaṃyojitāṃ pācayitvā dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:133_34: sa pratilabdhacakṣurbahiradhyātmaṃ dūre āsanne ca candrasūryaprabhāṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahān sarvarūpāṇi ca paśyet /
S04bsu036_u:133_35: evaṃ ca vadet - aho batāhaṃ mūḍhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:133_38: mukto 'smi andhabhāvāt / pratilabdhacakṣuścāsmi / na ca me kaścid viśiṣṭataro 'stīti /
S04bsu036_u:133_40: te taṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - kevalaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā cakṣuḥ pratilabdham /
S04bsu036_u:133_41: na tu bhavān kiṃcijjānāti / kuto 'bhimānaste samutpannaḥ? na ca te 'sti prajñā /
S04bsu036_u:133_42: na cāsi paṇḍitaḥ / tamenamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - yadā tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa antargṛhaṃ niṣaṇṇo bahiranyāni rūpāṇi na paśyasi,
S04bsu036_u:133_43: na ca jānāsi, nāpi te ye sattvāḥ snigdhacittā vā drugdhacittā vā /
S04bsu036_u:133_46: na śṛṇoṣi / krośāntaramapyanutkṣipya pādau na śaknoṣi gantum /
S04bsu036_u:133_48: tāṃ ca kriyāṃ na smarasi / tatkathamasi paṇḍitaḥ? kathaṃ ca sarvaṃ paśyāmīti
S04bsu036_u:133_49: vadasi? tatsādhu bhoḥ puruṣa yadandhakāraṃ tatprakāśamiti saṃjānīṣe,
S04bsu036_u:134_0: atha sa puruṣastān ṛṣīnevaṃ vadet - ka upāyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:134_1: kiṃ vā śubhaṃ karma kṛtvedṛśīṃ prajñāṃ pratilabheya,
S04bsu036_u:134_2: yuṣmākaṃ prasādāccaitān guṇān pratilabheya? atha khalu te ṛṣayastasya puruṣasyaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ - yadīcchasi,
S04bsu036_u:134_3: araṇye vasa / parvataguhāsu vā niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintaya /
S04bsu036_u:134_4: kleśāśca te prahātavyāḥ / tathā dhūtaguṇasamanvāgato 'bhijñāḥ pratilapsyase /
S04bsu036_u:134_6: araṇye vasan ekāgracitto lokatṛṣṇāṃ prahāya pañcābhijñāḥ prāpnuyāt /
S04bsu036_u:135_0: iti hi kāśyapa upamaiṣā kṛtā asyārthasya vijñaptaye /
S04bsu036_u:135_3: ye saddharmaṃ na jānanti, kleśatamondhakāraṃ ca saṃvardhayanti /
S04bsu036_u:135_6: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:135_8: tathāgatastu karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātukānniḥsṛtaḥ piteva priye ekaputrake karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātuke 'vatīrya sattvān saṃsāracakre paribhramataḥ saṃpaśyati /
S04bsu036_u:135_11: dṛṣṭvā ca jānāti - amī sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛtvā mandadveṣāstīvrarāgāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:135_12: mandarāgāstīvradveṣāḥ, kecidalpaprajñāḥ, kecit paṇḍitāḥ, kecitparipākaśuddhāḥ, kecinmithyādṛṣṭayaḥ / teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgata upāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānāni deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:135_13: tatra yathā te ṛṣayaḥ pañcābhijñā viśuddhacakṣuṣaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:135_14: evaṃ bodhisattvā bodhicittānyutpādya anutpattikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S04bsu036_u:136_0: tatra yathāsau mahāvaidyaḥ, evaṃ tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ / yathāsau jātyandhastathā mohāndhāḥ sattvā draṣṭavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:136_1: yathā vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ, evaṃ rāgadveṣamohāḥ, dvāṣaṣṭi ca dṛṣṭikṛtāni draṣṭavyāni /
S04bsu036_u:136_2: yathā catasra oṣadhayastathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitanirvāṇadvāraṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:136_5: evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayitvā sattvā avidyāṃ nirodhayanti /
S04bsu036_u:136_7: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:136_8: evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ na kuśale tiṣṭhati na pāpe /
S04bsu036_u:137_5: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate - na santyapare dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:137_6: nirvāṇaprāpto 'smīti / atha khalu tathāgatastasmai dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:137_7: yena sarvadharmā na prāptāḥ, kutastasya nirvāṇamiti? taṃ bhagavān bodhau samādāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:137_8: sa utpannabodhicitto na saṃsārasthito na nirvāṇaprāpto bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:137_9: so 'vabudhya traidhātukaṃ daśasu dikṣu śūnyaṃ nirmitopamaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnamarīcipratiśrutkopamaṃ lokaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu036_u:137_10: sa sarvadharmānanutpannānaniruddhān abaddhānamuktān atamondhakārān naprakāśān paśyati /
S04bsu036_u:138_0: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.46_1: sarvasattvān vinayate na conā naiva cādhikā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.47_0: yathā kulālo mṛdbhāṇḍaṃ kurvan mṛtsu samāsvapi /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.48_1: mṛdamekāṃ sa gṛhṇāti kurvan bhāṇḍāni bhārgavaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.49_0: yādṛk prakṣipyate dravyaṃ bhājanaṃ tena lakṣyate /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.55_0: jātyandhe tu mahāvaidyaḥ kāruṇyaṃ saṃniveśya ha /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.57_0: dantaiḥ saṃcūrṇya kāṃcittu piṣṭvā cānyāṃ tathāparām /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.59_0: evaṃ sattvā mahājñānā jātyandhāḥ saṃsaranti hi /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.65_0: maharṣayo yathā tasmai karuṇāṃ saṃniveśya vai /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.67_1: so adyāpi na jānāti kutastvaṃ vetsyase 'lpadhīḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.68_1: taṃ śrotuṃ na samartho 'si prāgevānyaṃ vidūrataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.69_1: te na śakyaṃ tvayā jñātumabhimānaḥ kuto 'sti te //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.70_0: krośamātre 'pi gantavye padavīṃ na vinā gatiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.70_1: mātuḥ kukṣau ca yadvṛttaṃ vismṛtaṃ tattadeva te //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.71_0: abhijñā yasya pañcaitāḥ sa sarvajña ihocyate /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.75_0: upāya eṣa buddhānāṃ vadanti yadimaṃ nayam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.76_0: tryadhvajñānamanantaṃ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.77_0: bodhicittaṃ ca ye cānye dharmā nirvāṇagāminaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.81_1: na caitān prekṣate nāpi kiṃciddharmaṃ vipaśyati //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_5.83_0: sarvadharmāḥ samāḥ sarve samāḥ samasamāḥ sadā /
S04bsu036_u:142_0: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:142_1: prativedayāmi / ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo bhikṣustriṃśato buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:142_3: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:142_4_0: sa paścime samucchraye avabhāsaprāptāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāvyūhe kalpe raśmiprabhāso
S04bsu036_u:142_4_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
S04bsu036_u:142_4_2: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:142_8_1: samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:142_11: na ca tatra māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ lapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:142_14: api tu khalu punastatra lokadhātau tasyaiva bhagavato raśmiprabhāsasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmaparigrahāyābhiyuktā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:143_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.1_0: paśyāmyahaṃ bhikṣava buddhacakṣuṣā sthaviro hyayaṃ kāśyapa buddha bheṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.2_0: triṃśatsahasrāḥ paripūrṇakoṭyo jinānayaṃ drakṣyati kāśyapo hyayam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.2_1: cariṣyatī tatra ca brahmacaryaṃ bauddhasya jñānasya kṛtena bhikṣavaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.3_0: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ samudāniya jñānamidaṃ anuttaram /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.3_1: sa paścime cocchrayi lokanātho bhaviṣyate apratimo maharṣiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:144_0: kṣetraṃ ca tasya pravaraṃ bhaviṣyati vicitra śuddhaṃ śubha darśanīyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.4_0: kṣetraṃ ca tasya pravaraṃ bhaviṣyati vicitra śuddhaṃ śubha darśanīyam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.4_2: manojñarūpaṃ sada premaṇīyaṃ suvarṇasūtraiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.5_0: ratnāmayā vṛkṣa tahiṃ vicitrā aṣṭāpadasmiṃ tahi ekameke /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.5_1: manojñagandhaṃ ca vimuñcamānā bheṣyanti kṣetrasmi imasmi bhikṣo //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.6_1: śvabhraprapātā na ca tatra santi samaṃ śivaṃ bheṣyati darśanīyam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.7_1: vaipulyasūtrāntadharāṇa tāyināṃ bahū bhaviṣyanti sahasra neke //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.8_0: anāsravā antimadehadhāriṇo bheṣyanti ye śrāvaka dharmarājñaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.8_1: pramāṇu teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate divyena jñānena gaṇitva kalpān //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.9_0: so dvādaśa antarakalpa sthāsyati saddharma viṃśāntarakalpa sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:145_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sthavira āyuṣmāṃśca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ pravepamānaiḥ kāyairbhagavantamanimiṣairnetrairvyavalokayanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:145_1: tasyāṃ ca velāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅamanaḥsaṃgītyā imā gāthā abhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.14_1: yathā hastasmi prakṣiptaṃ na tadbhuñjīta bhojanam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.15_0: evaṃ ca utsukā vīra śrutvā ghoṣamanuttaram /
S04bsu036_u:146_0_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣā mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ sthavirāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S04bsu036_u:146_0_1: punarapi sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ me bhikṣavo mahāśrāvakaḥ
S04bsu036_u:146_0_2: sthaviraḥ subhūtistriṃśata eva buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:146_3_0: bodhiṃ ca samudānayiṣyati / evaṃrūpāṃścādhikārān kṛtvā paścime samucchraye śaśiketurnāma
S04bsu036_u:146_3_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:146_3_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:146_4: ratnasaṃbhavaṃ ca nāmāsya tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:146_15: sa ca bhagavān vaihāyasamantarīkḥe sthitvā abhīkḥṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiḥyati,
S04bsu036_u:146_16: bahūni ca bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca śrāvakaśatasahasrāṇi vineḥyati /
S04bsu036_u:147_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.17_0: ārocayāmi ahamadya bhikṣavaḥ prativedayāmyadya mamā śṛṇotha /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.17_1: sthaviraḥ subhūtirmama śrāvako 'yaṃ bhaviṣyate buddha anāgate 'dhvani //
S04bsu036_u:148_0: buddhāṃśca paśyitva mahānubhāvān triṃśacca pūrṇānayutāna koṭīḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.18_0: buddhāṃśca paśyitva mahānubhāvān triṃśacca pūrṇānayutāna koṭīḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.18_2: cariṣyate carya tadānulomikīmimasya jñānasya kṛtena caiṣaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.20_0: sudarśanīyaṃ ca sukṣetra bheṣyati iṣṭaṃ manojñaṃ ca mahājanasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.20_1: vihariṣyate yatra sa lokabandhustāritva prāṇīnayutāna koṭīḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.21_1: tīkṣṇendriyāstasya jinasya śāsane ye śobhayiṣyanti ta buddhakṣetram //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_6.22_0: bahuśrāvakāstasya na saṃkhya teṣāṃ pramāṇu naivāsti kadāci teṣām /

S04bsu036_u:193_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste 'pi mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.47_1: tradhātukasmi buddhā vai sattvānāṃ ye pramocakāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.49_0: śūnyā acintiyāḥ kalpā atītāḥ pūrvi ye abhū /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.51_0: divyāḥ kāyāśca hīyante cyutā gacchanti durgatim /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.51_1: aśrutvā dharma buddhānāṃ gatyeṣāṃ bhoti pāpikā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.52_1: sukhaṃ vinaśyatī teṣāṃ sukhasaṃjñā ca naśyati //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.57_1: vayaṃ ca sarvasattvāśca agrāṃ bodhiṃ spṛśemahi //
S04bsu036_u:194_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:194_2: deśayatu bhagavān nirvṛtim / tārayatu bhagavān sarvasattvān /
S04bsu036_u:194_4: deśayatu bhagavān / dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:194_5: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokanukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:195_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhyāṃ sārūpyābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.58_1: pramocayā duḥkhaśataiśca sattvān nirvāṇamārgaṃ ca pradarśayasva //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.59_0: asmābhiradhyeṣitu bhāṣa dharmamasmānanugṛhṇa imaṃ ca lokam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_7.59_1: valgusvaraṃ co madhuraṃ pramuñca samudānitaṃ kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:196_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:196_0_1: brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca ṣoḍaśānāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājakumārāṇām,
S04bsu036_u:196_1_0: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsa triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramapravartitaṃ
S04bsu036_u:196_1_1: śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā kenacit punarloke
S04bsu036_u:196_3: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ, iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyamiti /
S04bsu036_u:196_4: pratītyasamutpādapravṛttiṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa - iti hi bhikṣavo 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:196_5: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam, nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam,
S04bsu036_u:196_6: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā,
S04bsu036_u:196_7: tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:196_8: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:196_18: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:197_0_0: sahapravartitaṃ cedaṃ bhikṣavastena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā
S04bsu036_u:197_0_1: samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:197_1: atha tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte ṣaṣṭeḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni /
S04bsu036_u:197_2: sarve ca te traividyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:197_3: punaranupūrveṇa bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dvitīyāṃ dharmadeśanāmakārṣīt,
S04bsu036_u:198_1: tataḥ paścād bhikṣavastasya bhagavato gaṇanāsamatikrāntaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:199_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva samānāḥ śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:199_1: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino 'rthinaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu036_u:199_2_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:199_2_2: bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato
S04bsu036_u:199_3: tat sādhu bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu,
S04bsu036_u:199_7: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti /
S04bsu036_u:200_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:201_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:201_0_2: nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
S04bsu036_u:201_0_3: vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām /
S04bsu036_u:202_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:203_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān vyākārṣīdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:203_1: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:203_2: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:204_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
S04bsu036_u:204_0_1: imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ
S04bsu036_u:204_1: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:205_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:205_0_1: tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya
S04bsu036_u:205_0_2: teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
S04bsu036_u:205_0_3: dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:205_1_0: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:205_1_1: samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān /
S04bsu036_u:206_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:206_2: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:206_4: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
S04bsu036_u:206_6: paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:206_7: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ [Vaidya_119] śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti /
S04bsu036_u:206_8: na pratibādhiṣyante, sarve te kṣipramanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherlābhino bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:207_0: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane 'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:207_1_0: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena
S04bsu036_u:207_2: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni /
S04bsu036_u:208_0: ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ, prativedayāmi vaḥ / ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:208_2: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
S04bsu036_u:208_3: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:208_4: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_5: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_6: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_7: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_8: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_9: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_10: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_11: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:208_12: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:209_0_0: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya
S04bsu036_u:209_0_1: bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni
S04bsu036_u:209_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ duradhimocyaṃ hi bhikṣavastathāgatajñānam [Vaidya_120] /
S04bsu036_u:209_6_0: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni
S04bsu036_u:210_0: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate 'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:210_3: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:210_4: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
S04bsu036_u:210_6: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:210_10: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
S04bsu036_u:210_11: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
S04bsu036_u:210_12: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati /
S04bsu036_u:210_13: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:210_14: kaḥ punarvādastṛtīyasya? upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
S04bsu036_u:211_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram /
S04bsu036_u:211_1: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:211_2: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām /
S04bsu036_u:211_4: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet - yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ - vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:211_7: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet - mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti /
S04bsu036_u:211_9: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:211_10: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa,
S04bsu036_u:211_11: mā nivartadhvam / ayamasau mahājanapadaḥ / atra viśrāmyata / atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam /
S04bsu036_u:212_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ - muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt /
S04bsu036_u:212_2: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:212_5: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:212_6: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:212_8: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti /
S04bsu036_u:213_0: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:213_2: paśyati - mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:213_3: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:213_5: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
S04bsu036_u:213_6: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati - idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
S04bsu036_u:213_7_0: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve
S04bsu036_u:213_7_1: nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S04bsu036_u:213_8: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:213_9: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyevaṃ saṃśrāvayati - na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:260_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? bahavo bhaiṣajyarāja gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāśca [Vaidya_146] bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S04bsu036_u:260_10: na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā likhanāya vā pūjanāya vā /
S04bsu036_u:260_11: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:260_15: tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:261_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī /
S04bsu036_u:261_2: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam,
S04bsu036_u:261_3: tāvajjānīyāt, dūra itastāvadūdakamiti / atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet,
S04bsu036_u:261_5: atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ - āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti /
S04bsu036_u:261_6: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:261_9: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti bhavayanti,
S04bsu036_u:261_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? paramasaṃdhābhāṣitavivaraṇo hyayaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:261_14: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet,
S04bsu036_u:261_15: navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:261_16: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
S04bsu036_u:261_17: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:262_0: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayet,
S04bsu036_u:262_1_0: tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ
S04bsu036_u:262_1_1: prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane niṣadya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:262_2: katamaśca bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatalayanam? sarvasattvamaitrīvihāraḥ svalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatalayanam /
S04bsu036_u:262_4: katamacca bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaram? mahākṣāntisauratyaṃ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaram /
S04bsu036_u:262_5: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam /
S04bsu036_u:262_6: katamacca bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya dharmāsanam? sarvadharmaśūnyatāpraveśaḥ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya dharmāsanam /
S04bsu036_u:262_9: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:262_10: anyalokadhātusthitaścāhaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja tasya kulaputrasya nirmitaiḥ [Vaidya_147] parṣadaḥ samāvartayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:262_12: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:262_16: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:263_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.16_1: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.17_0: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.17_1: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.18_0: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.19_0: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.19_1: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.20_0: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.22_0: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.23_0: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.24_1: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.25_0: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.25_1: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.27_0: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.27_1: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.28_1: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.29_1: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.32_0: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.33_0: etādṛśāstasya guṇā bhavanti caturṇa parṣāṇa prakāśakasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.33_1: eko vihāre vanakandareṣu svādhyāya kurvantu mamāhi paśyet //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.34_0: pratibhāna tasya bhavatī asaṅgaṃ nirukti dharmāṇa bahū prajānāti /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.34_1: toṣeti so prāṇisahasrakoṭyaḥ yathāpi buddhena adhiṣṭhitatvāt //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.35_0: ye cāpi tasyāśrita bhonti sattvāste bodhisattvā laghu bhonti sarve /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_10.35_1: tatsaṃgatiṃ cāpi niṣevamāṇāḥ paśyanti buddhāna yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:268_0: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo 'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena /
S04bsu036_u:268_1_0: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ
S04bsu036_u:268_2: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:268_4: tadyathā - suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya musāragalvasyāśmagarbhasya lohitamukteḥ karketanasya /
S04bsu036_u:268_5: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti /
S04bsu036_u:268_6: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
S04bsu036_u:269_0_0: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe
S04bsu036_u:269_0_1: sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo
S04bsu036_u:270_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:270_1_0: kaḥ pratyayaḥ, asyaivaṃrūpasya mahāratnastūpasya loke prādurbhāvāya? ko vā bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:270_1_1: asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati? evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ
S04bsu036_u:270_1_2: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati
S04bsu036_u:270_2: tasyaiṣa stūpaḥ / sa eṣa śabdaṃ niścārayati / asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:270_4: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt - ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:270_5: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:270_6: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:270_8_0: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
S04bsu036_u:270_8_1: parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:270_8_2: prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam - mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya
S04bsu036_u:270_10_0: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt
S04bsu036_u:270_10_1: - ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ [Vaidya_150]
S04bsu036_u:270_12: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet /
S04bsu036_u:270_13: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:270_16: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe 'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma /
S04bsu036_u:271_0: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena /
S04bsu036_u:271_1_0: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tasya khalu
S04bsu036_u:271_2: etadasya praṇidhānam - yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:271_3: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo 'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam /
S04bsu036_u:271_4: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
S04bsu036_u:271_5: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:271_6: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:271_7: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām /
S04bsu036_u:271_9: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:272_0: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai /
S04bsu036_u:273_1: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:273_2: te sarve saṃdṛśyante sma / tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:273_5: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:273_6: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:273_7: evaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi / evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi /
S04bsu036_u:273_8_0: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi / evaṃ paścimottarāyāṃ diśi / evamuttarāyāṃ diśi / evamuttarapūrvasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:273_8_1: diśi / evamadhastāyāṃ diśi / evamūrdhvāyāṃ diśi / evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:273_8_2: diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S04bsu036_u:274_0: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma - gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
S04bsu036_u:274_3: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:274_4_0: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī
S04bsu036_u:274_6: iti hi tasmin samaye ye 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:274_8: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:274_9: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:274_10: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:274_12: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam /
S04bsu036_u:274_14: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:275_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:275_1: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:275_2: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04bsu036_u:275_5: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca [Vaidya_152] vṛkṣaiścitritam /
S04bsu036_u:275_7: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:275_8: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma /
S04bsu036_u:275_9: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham /
S04bsu036_u:275_15: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā /
S04bsu036_u:276_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04bsu036_u:276_2: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:276_3: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:276_4: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam /
S04bsu036_u:276_5: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma - gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam /
S04bsu036_u:276_6_0: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:276_6_1: vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:276_8: evaṃ ca vadadhvam - dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane /
