S04bsu036_u:287_4: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā /
S04bsu036_u:287_5: na ca tebhyaḥ parihīyate / smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate /
S04bsu036_u:287_7: prajñākūṭo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto 'nekāni puṇyāni kṛtavān /
S04bsu036_u:287_8: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān /
S04bsu036_u:287_9: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro 'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:287_10: paścād bodhimabhisaṃbuddha / ka evaṃ śraddadhyāt, yadanayā śakyaṃ muhūrtena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum? [Vaidya_161]
S04bsu036_u:288_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_11.49_0: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_11.51_0: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me 'tra tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:289_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat - kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya cittamutpannam /
S04bsu036_u:289_3: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati,
S04bsu036_u:289_4: anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti,
S04bsu036_u:289_5: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati, na cādyāpi buddhatvaṃ prāpnoti /
S04bsu036_u:289_6: kiṃ kāraṇam? pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti /
S04bsu036_u:289_7: katamāni pañca? prathamaṃ brahmasthānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam /
S04bsu036_u:290_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti,
S04bsu036_u:290_1: yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate /
S04bsu036_u:290_2: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:290_4: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat - yo 'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:290_5: sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti? sthavira āha - tvayā ca śīghraṃ datto bhagavatā ca śīghraṃ pratigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:290_6: sāgaranāgarājaduhitā āha - yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām,
S04bsu036_u:291_0_0: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya
S04bsu036_u:291_0_1: pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:291_2: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:291_3: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma,
S04bsu036_u:291_4: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:291_6: te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:291_8: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu036_u:291_10: sā ca vimalā lokadhātuḥ, iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
S04bsu036_u:291_13: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām /
S04bsu036_u:296_0_0: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāpratibhānaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:296_1: vayamimaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sattvānāṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:296_2: kiṃcāpi bhagavan śaṭhakāḥ sattvāstasmin kāle bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:296_3: parīttakuśalamūlā adhimānikā lābhasatkārasaṃniśritā akuśalamūlapratipannā durdamā adhimuktivirahitā anadhimuktibahulāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:296_4_0: api tu khalu punarvayaṃ bhagavan kṣāntibalamupadarśayitvā tasmin kāle idaṃ sūtramuddekṣyāmo
S04bsu036_u:296_4_1: dhārayiṣyāmo deśayiṣyāmo likhiṣyāmaḥ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:296_5: kāyajīvitaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan utsṛjya idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:297_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavanta metadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan utsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum,
S04bsu036_u:297_1: api tu khalu punarbhagavan anyāsu lokadhātuṣviti /
S04bsu036_u:297_2: atha khalu yāvantaste bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:297_3: aṣṭau bhikṣusahasrāṇi, sarvāṇi tāni yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu /
S04bsu036_u:297_4: vayamapīmaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu /
S04bsu036_u:297_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? asyāṃ bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhimānikāḥ sattvā alpakuśalamūlā nityaṃ vyāpannacittāḥ śaṭhā vaṅkajātīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:298_0_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato mātṛbhaginī ṣaḍbhirbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:298_0_1: śaikṣāśaikṣābhirbhikṣuṇībhiḥ utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamullokayantī
S04bsu036_u:298_1_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ tvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:298_1_1: gautami durmanasvinī sthitā tathāgataṃ vyavalokayasi? nāhaṃ parikīrtitā vyākṛtā ca
S04bsu036_u:298_2: api tu khalu punargautami sarvaparṣadvayākaraṇena vyākṛtāsi /
S04bsu036_u:298_3_0: api tu khalu punastvaṃ gautami ita upādāya aṣṭātriṃśatāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike
S04bsu036_u:298_3_1: satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:298_4: imānyapi ṣaḍ bhikṣuṇīsahasrāṇi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tvayaiva sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike bodhisattvā dharmabhāṇakā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:298_5_0: tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma
S04bsu036_u:298_5_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:298_5_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:298_6: sa ca gautami sarvasattvapriyadarśanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastāni ṣaḍ bodhisattvasahasrāṇi paraṃparāvyākaraṇena vyākariṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:299_0: atha khalu rāhulamāturyaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyā etadabhavat - na me bhagavatā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitam /
S04bsu036_u:299_1: atha khalu bhagavān yaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyāścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya yaśodharāṃ bhikṣuṇīmetadavocat - ārocayāmi te yaśodhare,
S04bsu036_u:299_2: prativedayāmi te / tvamapi daśānāṃ buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi /
S04bsu036_u:299_3_0: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca anupūrveṇa paripūrya raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu036_u:299_3_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān bhadrāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:299_4: aparimitaṃ ca tasya bhagavato raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:300_0_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇī ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā yaśodharā ca
S04bsu036_u:300_0_1: bhikṣuṇī caturbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā bhagavato 'ntikāt svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā
S04bsu036_u:300_0_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣanta
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.1_0: bhagavan vinetāsi vināyako 'si śāstāsi lokasya sadevakasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.1_1: āśvāsadātā naradevapūjito vayaṃ pi saṃtoṣita adya nātha //
S04bsu036_u:301_0: atha khalu tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan samutsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye,
S04bsu036_u:302_0: atha khalu bhagavān yena tānyaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhāraṇīpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartikadharmacakrapravartakānāṃ tenāvalokayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:302_1_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samanantarāvalokitā bhagavatā utthāyāsanebhyo
S04bsu036_u:302_1_1: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmyaivaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ - asmākaṃ bhagavān adhyeṣati asya
S04bsu036_u:302_2_0: te khalvevamanuvicintya saṃprakampitāḥ parasparamūcuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ kulaputrāḥ kariṣyāmo
S04bsu036_u:302_2_1: yad bhagavānadhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasyānāgate 'dhvani saṃprakāśanatāyai? atha
S04bsu036_u:302_2_2: khalu te kulaputrā bhagavato gauraveṇa ātmanaśca purvacaryāpraṇidhānena bhagavato
S04bsu036_u:302_2_3: 'bhimukhaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadante sma - vayaṃ bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:302_2_4: tathāgate parinirvṛte daśasu dikṣu gatvā sarvasattvāṃllekhayiṣyāmaḥ pāṭhayiṣyāmaścintāpayiṣyāmaḥ
S04bsu036_u:303_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samasaṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta - [Vaidya_164]
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.2_0: alpotsukastvaṃ bhagavan bhavasva vayaṃ tadā te parinirvṛtasya /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.2_1: svaṃ paścime kāli subhairavasmin prakāśayiṣyāmida sūtramuttamam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.4_1: aprāpte prāptasaṃjñī ca ghore kālasmi paścime //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.6_0: raseṣu gṛddha saktāśca gṛhīṇāṃ dharma deśayī /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.8_1: tīrthikā batime bhikṣū svāni kāvyāni deśayuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.10_1: viprāṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ cāpi bhikṣuṇām //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.12_0: ye cāsmān kutsayiṣyanti tasmin kālasmi durmatī /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.15_0: anarthikāḥ sma kāyena jīvitena ca nāyaka /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.17_0: bhṛkuṭī sarva soḍhavyā aprajñaptiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.19_1: gatvā gatvāsya dāsyāmo nikṣepaṃ tava nāyaka //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.20_1: alpotsuko bhava tvaṃ hi śāntiprāpto sunirvṛtaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_12.21_0: sarve ca lokapradyotā āgatā ye diśo daśa /
S04bsu036_u:308_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata - duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa /
S04bsu036_u:308_1_0: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime
S04bsu036_u:308_1_1: samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ? evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat -
S04bsu036_u:308_1_2: caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ
S04bsu036_u:308_2: katameṣu caturṣu? iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:308_3: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati? yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:308_5: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati,
S04bsu036_u:308_9: katamaśca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gocaraḥ? yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate,
S04bsu036_u:308_10: na rājaputrān na rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati,
S04bsu036_u:308_12: na bhajate na paryupāste, na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04bsu036_u:308_13: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:308_14: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān /
S04bsu036_u:308_16: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:308_18: taṃ cāniśrito bhāṣate / śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04bsu036_u:308_19: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:308_20: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā /
S04bsu036_u:308_21: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu036_u:308_22: taṃ cāniśrito bhāṣate / ayaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gocaraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:309_0: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu036_u:309_1: na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:309_2: na ca kulānyupasaṃkramati, na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate,
S04bsu036_u:309_3: na pratisaṃmodayati / na ca paṇḍakasya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu036_u:309_4: na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:309_5: na ca pratisaṃmodayati / na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:309_11: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati,
S04bsu036_u:309_12: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:309_13: na ca saṃlāpaṃ karoti / sa ca pratisaṃlayanaguruko bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:310_0: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati,
S04bsu036_u:310_2: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare sthito bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:311_0: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.3_0: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.6_0: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.7_1: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.9_0: na tā saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ hāsa pṛcchitum /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.12_0: vāramukhyā na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.13_0: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_13.13_1: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet //

S04bsu036_u:343_2: ye yuṣmābhiradṛṣṭapūrvāḥ, ya etarhi pṛthivīvirebhyo niṣkrāntāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:343_3: mayaite ajita sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:343_5: mayā caite kulaputrā asmin bodhisattvadharme paripācitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā niveśitāḥ parisaṃsthāpitā avatāritāḥ paribodhitāḥ pariśodhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:343_6: ete ca ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhastādākāśadhātuparigrahe prativasanti /
S04bsu036_u:343_7: svādhyāyoddeśacintāyoniśomanasikārapravṛttā ete kulaputrā asaṃgaṇikārāmā asaṃsargābhiratā anikṣiptadhurā ārabdhavīryāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:344_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.37_0: ye bodhisattvā ime aprameyā acintiyā yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.38_0: paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiti bodhaye mamaiva kṣetrasmi vasanti caite /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.38_1: paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiva ete mamaiva putrāścimi bodhisattvāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.39_0: sarve ti āraṇyadhutābhiyuktāḥ saṃsargabhūmiṃ sada varjayanti /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.39_1: asaṅgacārī ca mamaiti putrā mamottamāṃ caryanuśikṣamāṇāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.40_0: vasanti ākāśaparigrahe 'smin kṣetrasya heṣṭhā paricāri vīrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.41_0: ārabdhavīryāḥ smṛtimanta sarve prajñābalasmin sthita aprameye /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.41_1: viśāradā dharmu kathenti caite prabhāsvarā putra mamaiti sarve //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.42_0: mayā ca prāpya imamagrabodhiṃ nagare gayāyāṃ drumamūli tatra /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.42_1: anuttaraṃ vartiya dharmacakraṃ paripācitāḥ sarvi ihāgrabodhau //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.43_0: anāsravā bhūta iyaṃ mi vācā śruṇitva sarve mama śraddadhadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.43_1: evaṃ ciraṃ prāpta mayāgrabodhi paripācitāścaiti mayaiva sarve //
S04bsu036_u:345_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:345_1: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni - kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:345_3_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena
S04bsu036_u:345_3_2: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā? tasyādya bhagavan kālasya sātiriṃkāṇi catvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi /
S04bsu036_u:345_4: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
S04bsu036_u:345_6_0: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu036_u:345_6_1: samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca? asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya
S04bsu036_u:346_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:346_2: evaṃ ca vadet - ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti /
S04bsu036_u:346_3: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ - eṣo 'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:346_4: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam /
S04bsu036_u:346_12: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati - mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:346_14: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti /
S04bsu036_u:346_15: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ - ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti /
S04bsu036_u:346_17: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante /
S04bsu036_u:346_18: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:346_19: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:346_22: anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti /
S04bsu036_u:347_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.44_1: prāpto 'si bodhiṃ nagare gayāhvaye kālo 'yamalpo 'tra tu lokanātha //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.45_0: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū ye kalpakoṭīcaritā mahāgaṇī /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.45_1: ṛddhībale ca sthita aprakampitāḥ suśikṣitāḥ prajñabale gatiṃgatāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.46_0: anūpaliptāḥ padumaṃ va vāriṇā bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.46_1: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ smṛtimanta lokādhipatisya putrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.47_0: kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.47_1: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.48_0: yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.48_1: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.49_0: valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.49_1: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.50_0: emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.51_0: dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.52_0: asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.52_1: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.53_0: kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.53_1: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.54_0: vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_14.54_1: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime //
S04bsu036_u:352_0: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:352_2: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:352_4: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:352_6: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:352_8: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:352_10: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:352_11: bhāṣatu sugataḥ / vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhāṣitamabhiśraddhāsyāma iti /
S04bsu036_u:353_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
S04bsu036_u:353_1_0: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
S04bsu036_u:353_2: naivaṃ draṣṭavyam / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
S04bsu036_u:353_3: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:353_5: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:353_6: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:353_7: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:353_8_0: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ
S04bsu036_u:353_8_1: vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca
S04bsu036_u:353_10: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:353_11: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate /
S04bsu036_u:354_0: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:354_1: prativedayāmi vaḥ / yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
S04bsu036_u:354_2: yeṣu ca nopanikṣiptāni, sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:354_4: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu036_u:354_6: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:354_10: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:354_12: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_13: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_15: yatkhalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ, tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti,
S04bsu036_u:354_18: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_19: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
S04bsu036_u:354_20: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
S04bsu036_u:354_23: tatkasya hetoḥ? dṛṣṭaṃ hi tathāgatena traidhātukaṃ yathābhūtam /
S04bsu036_u:354_24: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
S04bsu036_u:354_25: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā /
S04bsu036_u:354_26: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti /
S04bsu036_u:354_30: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:354_34: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā /
S04bsu036_u:354_35: āyuṣpramāṇamapyaparipūrṇam / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt /
S04bsu036_u:354_36: idānīṃ [Vaidya_191] khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:354_37_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me
S04bsu036_u:354_37_2: kāmalolupā andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā
S04bsu036_u:354_38: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti /
S04bsu036_u:354_41: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:354_42: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:354_43: bhavati vā na vā / tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti /
S04bsu036_u:354_44: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:354_45: śokasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti / apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya /
S04bsu036_u:354_46: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:354_47: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:354_50: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:354_51: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:354_53: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_54: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_55: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_56: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:354_57: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_60: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:354_61: evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_63: dadasva nastāta jīvitamiti / atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
S04bsu036_u:354_64: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:354_65: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:354_66: evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam /
S04bsu036_u:354_67: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
S04bsu036_u:354_69: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_70: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354_71: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:354_72: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti /

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.31_0: vicikitsāṃ ca varjitvā iñjitā manyitāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.32_1: na te trasanti śrutvedaṃ mama āyuracintiyam //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.36_1: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ vijānanti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu036_u:366_0: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta,
S04bsu036_u:366_2: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:367_0: yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
S04bsu036_u:367_1_0: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam - yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ
S04bsu036_u:367_2: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām /
S04bsu036_u:367_3: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:367_4: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S04bsu036_u:368_0: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,
S04bsu036_u:368_1: ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:368_3: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ 'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati /
S04bsu036_u:368_4: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:368_5: na vihārā kartavyāḥ, na bhikṣusaṃghāya glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāstenānupradeyā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:368_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
S04bsu036_u:368_8: yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ savaijayantīkā ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:368_9_0: teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā nānāvidhairdivyairmānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhirvividhamadhuramanojñapaṭupaṭahadundubhimahādundubhibhirvādyatālaninādarnirghoṣaśabdairnānāvidhaiśca
S04bsu036_u:368_10: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā [Vaidya_202] prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:368_13: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:368_14: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:368_16: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā,
S04bsu036_u:368_17: tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi - na me tena parinirvṛtasya dhātustūpāḥ kārayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:368_18: na saṃghapūjā / kaḥ punarvādo 'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena
S04bsu036_u:368_19: vā prajñayā vā saṃpādayet, bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam /
S04bsu036_u:368_20: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu,
S04bsu036_u:368_21_0: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān
S04bsu036_u:368_21_1: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā /
S04bsu036_u:368_25: pareṣāṃ ca saṃprakāśayet, kṣāntyā ca saṃpādayet, śīlavāṃśca bhavet, kalyāṇadharmaḥ sukhasaṃvāsaḥ kṣāntaśca bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:368_32: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā parikīrtitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:368_33: so 'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ - bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu036_u:368_34: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā,
S04bsu036_u:368_36: tathāgatastūpo 'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti /
S04bsu036_u:369_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.37_0: puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.41_1: kṛtā vādyaiśca vastraiśca dundubhībhiḥ punaḥ puna //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.42_0: madhurā vādyabhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.43_0: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāli ca deśayet /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.43_1: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.47_0: saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.48_0: adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.48_1: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.50_0: dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.51_0: kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.51_1: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.53_0: kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.54_1: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.55_0: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.55_1: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.56_0: ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.58_1: mūrdhena vanditva ca tasya pādau tathāgato 'yaṃ janayeta saṃjñām //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.59_0: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle gamiṣyate eṣa drumasya mūlam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.59_1: budhyiṣyate bodhimanuttarāṃ śivāṃ hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.60_0: yasmiṃśca so caṃkrami tādṛśo viduḥ tiṣṭheta vā yatra niṣīdayedvā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.60_1: śayyāṃ ca kalpeya kahiṃci dhīro bhāṣantu gāthāṃ pi tu ekasūtrāt //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.61_1: uddiśya buddhaṃ bhagavanta nāyakaṃ pūjāṃ ca citrāṃ tahi kārayettathā //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.62_0: mayā sa bhuktaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo mayā svayaṃ caṃkramitaṃ ca tatraṃ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_16.62_1: tatropaviṣṭo ahameva ca syāṃ yatra sthitaḥ so bhavi buddhaputraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:370_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:373_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā anumodet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S04bsu036_u:373_1: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?
S04bsu036_u:374_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:375_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścidajita
S04bsu036_u:375_0_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāya deśyamānaṃ
S04bsu036_u:375_0_2: saṃprakāśyamānaṃ śṛṇuyād bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā vijñapuruṣo
S04bsu036_u:375_1: kumārikā vā, śrutvā ca abhyanumodeta, sacettato dharmaśravaṇādutthāya prakrāmet,
S04bsu036_u:375_2_0: sa ca vihāragato vā gṛhagato vā araṇyagato vā vīthīgato vā grāmagato vā janapadagato
S04bsu036_u:375_2_1: vā tān hetūṃstāni kāraṇāni taṃ dharmaṃ yathāśrutaṃ yathodgṛhītaṃ yathābalamaparasya
S04bsu036_u:375_3: saṃmoditasya vā anyasya vā saṃstutasya kasyacit,
S04bsu036_u:375_6: so 'pi yadi śrutvānumodeta, anumodya ca so 'pyaparasmai ācakṣīta,
S04bsu036_u:375_7: so 'pi taṃ śrutvānumodeta / ityanena paryāyeṇa yāvat pañcāśat paraṃparayā /
S04bsu036_u:375_8: atha khalvajita yo 'sau pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣo bhavet paraṃparāśravānumodakaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:375_9: tasyāpi tāvadahamajita kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhinirdekṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:375_10: taṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu036_u:376_0: tadyathāpi nāma ajita caturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu ye sattvāḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānāḥ ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:376_1_0: aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā
S04bsu036_u:376_1_1: asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñino vā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā
S04bsu036_u:376_1_2: vā yāvadeva sattvāḥ sattvadhātau saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:376_2: atha kaścideva puruṣaḥ samutpadyeta puṇyakāmo hitakāmastasya sattvakāyasya sarvakāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāniṣṭān kāntān priyān manāpān dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:376_3: ekaikasya sattvasya jambudvīpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dadyāt kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāya,
S04bsu036_u:376_5: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:376_6: atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet - ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:376_7: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā [Vaidya_206] aśītivarṣikā jātyā /
S04bsu036_u:376_10: atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:376_12: tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:376_13: śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:376_16_0: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:376_16_1: prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:376_17: evametat sugata / anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S04bsu036_u:377_0: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ārocayāmi te ajita,
S04bsu036_u:377_1_0: prativedayāmi / yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu
S04bsu036_u:377_1_1: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S04bsu036_u:377_2: yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta /
S04bsu036_u:377_5: idameva tato bahutaram / yo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ pañcāśattamaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:377_6: tataḥ puruṣaparaṃparāta ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodet /
S04bsu036_u:377_7_0: asya anumodanāsahagatasya ajita puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya anumodanāsahagatasya
S04bsu036_u:377_8: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti /
S04bsu036_u:377_9: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniḥadamapi na kḥamate /
S04bsu036_u:377_10: evamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamajita so 'pi tāvat pañcāśattamaḥ paraṃparāśravaṇe puruḥa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:377_11: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita yo 'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:377_12: śrutvā cābhyanumodet, aprameyataramasaṃkhyayetaraṃ tasyāhamajita taṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ vadāmi /
S04bsu036_u:378_0: yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:378_1: sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā /
S04bsu036_u:378_2: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:378_3: aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:378_4: sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:378_7: tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām /
S04bsu036_u:378_8: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:378_10: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:378_11: sa sattvastena protsāhena kuśalamūlenābhisaṃskṛtena dhāraṇīpratilabdhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu036_u:378_12: ajaḍaśca bhavati, tīkṣṇendriyaḥ prajñāvān / na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi /
S04bsu036_u:378_13_0: nāpyasya jihvārogo bhavati, na mukharogo bhavati / na ca śyāmadanto bhavati, na viṣamadanto
S04bsu036_u:378_13_1: bhavati, na pītadanto bhavati, na duḥsaṃsthitadanto na khaṇḍadanto na patitadanto
S04bsu036_u:378_14: nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:378_15_0: na cipīṭanāso bhavati, na vakranāso bhavati / na dīrghamukho bhavati, na vaṅkamukho
S04bsu036_u:378_15_1: bhavati, na kṛṣṇamukho bhavati, nāpriyadarśanamukhaḥ / api tu khalvajita sūkṣmasujātajihvādantoṣṭho
S04bsu036_u:378_19: kṣipraṃ ca buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu036_u:378_20: paśya ajita ekasattvamapi nāma utsāhayitvā iyat puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:379_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_17.2_1: anumodayitvā ca prasannacittaḥ śṛṇuṣva puṇyaṃ bhavi yattakaṃ tat //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_17.3_0: sa caiva puruṣo bhavi dānadātā sattvān koṭīnayuteṣu nityam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_17.3_1: ye pūrvamaupamyakṛtā mayā vai tān sarvi tarpeya aśīti varṣān //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_17.4_0: so dṛṣṭva teṣāṃ ca jarāmupasthitāṃ valī ca khaṇḍaṃ ca śiraśca pāṇḍaram /

S04bsu036_u:404_16: anena mahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhikṣubhūto noddeśaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:404_17: na svādhyāya karoti, anyatra yaṃ yameva paśyati dūragatamapi,
S04bsu036_u:404_18: sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:404_19: taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:404_20: aparibhūtā yūyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvā yūyaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradhvam /
S04bsu036_u:404_22: yaṃ yameva mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā evaṃ saṃśrāvayati,
S04bsu036_u:404_24_1: paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ
S04bsu036_u:404_25: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:404_26: na ca kasyacit krudhyati, na vyāpādacittamutpādayati / ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti,
S04bsu036_u:404_27: sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:404_28: tasya tābhirabhimānikabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃśrāvyamāṇābhiḥ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:405_0_0: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:405_0_1: pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ
S04bsu036_u:405_1: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo viṃśatibhirgāthāviṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairbhāṣito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:405_2: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu036_u:405_3: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,
S04bsu036_u:405_4: imāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ cakṣurviśuddhiṃ śrotraviśuddhiṃ ghrāṇaviśuddhiṃ jihvāviśuddhiṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ manoviśuddhiṃ ca pratilabdhavān /
S04bsu036_u:405_5: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:405_7: ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:405_9: tasyodārarddhibalasthāmaṃ pratijñāpratibhānabalasthāmaṃ prajñābalasthāmaṃ [Vaidya_226] ca dṛṣṭvā sarve 'nusahāyībhūtā abhūvan dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu036_u:405_10: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:406_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:406_2_0: so 'nupūrveṇa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyanupūrveṇa dundubhisvararājasahanāmnāṃ
S04bsu036_u:406_5: so 'nenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyapūrveṇa meghasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatimeva tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:406_9: śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:407_0_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyatāṃ tathāgata
S04bsu036_u:407_0_1: koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:407_0_2: anyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ
S04bsu036_u:407_1: sarveṣu ca teṣu imameva saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:407_2: ārāgayitvā sa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena paripakvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:407_3: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:407_4: yastasya bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:407_5: yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan? na khalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:407_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahameva sa mahāsthāmaprāpta tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu036_u:407_7: yadā mayā mahāsthāmaprāpta pūrvamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo nodgṛhīto 'bhaviṣyat,
S04bsu036_u:407_9: yataścāhaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta paurvikāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāritavān vācitavān deśitavān,
S04bsu036_u:407_11_0: yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni
S04bsu036_u:407_11_1: bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:407_17: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:407_18: te ca sarve tasmāt karmāvaraṇāt parimuktāḥ
S04bsu036_u:407_19: / tenaiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:407_20_0: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - katame tena
S04bsu036_u:407_20_1: kālena tena samayena te sattvā abhūvan ye te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ ptahāsattvamullāpitavanta
S04bsu036_u:407_20_2: uccagghitavantaḥ? asyāmeva mahāsthāmaprāpta parṣadi bhadrapālapramukhāṇi pañca bodhisattvaśatāni
S04bsu036_u:407_21: evamiyaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta mahārthasya dharmaparyāyasya dhāraṇā vācanā deśanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā saṃvartate /
S04bsu036_u:407_22: tasmāttarhi mahāsthāmaprāpta ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvairmahāsattvaistathāgate parinirvṛte abhīkṣṇaṃ dhārayitavyo vācayitavyo deśayitavyaḥ saṃprakāśayitavya iti /
S04bsu036_u:408_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.2_0: tasya jinasya parinirvṛtasya saddharma saṃkṣobha vrajanti paścime /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.2_1: bhikṣū abhūṣī tada bodhisattvo nāmena so sadaparibhūta ucyate //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.3_0: upasaṃkramitvā tada bhikṣu anyān upalambhadṛṣṭīna tathaiva bhikṣuṇī /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.3_1: paribhāva mahyaṃ na kadācidasti yūyaṃ hi caryāṃ carathāgrabodhaye //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.4_0: evaṃ ca saṃśrāvayi nityakālaṃ ākrośa paribhāṣa sahantu teṣām /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.4_1: kālakriyāyāṃ samupasthitāyāṃ śrutaṃ idaṃ sūtramabhūṣi tena //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.5_0: akṛtva kālaṃ tada paṇḍitena adhiṣṭhihitvā ca sudīrghamāyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.5_1: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tadāsīt tahi śāsane tasya vināyakasya //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.6_0: te cāpi sarve bahu opalambhikā bodhīya tena paripācitāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.7_0: anupūrva puṇyena kṛtena tena prakāśayitvā imu sūtra nityam /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.7_1: bodhiṃ sa saṃprāpta jinasya putro ahameva so śākyamunistadāsīt //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.8_0: ye cāpi bhikṣū tada opalambhikā yā bhikṣuṇī ye ca upāsakā vā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.8_1: upāsikāstatra ca yā tadāsīd ye bodhi saṃśrāvita paṇḍitena //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.9_0: te cāpi dṛṣṭvā bahubuddhakoṭya ime ca te pañcaśatā anūnakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.9_1: tathaiva bhikṣūṇa ca bhikṣuṇī ca upāsikāścāpi mi mahya saṃmukham //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.10_0: sarve mayā śrāvita agradharmā te caiva sarve paripācitā me /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.10_1: mayi nirvṛte cāpimi sarvi dhīrā imu dhārayiṣyanti ha sūtramagram //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.11_0: kalpāna koṭyo bahubhīracintyairna kadācidetādṛśa dharma śrūyate /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.11_1: buddhāna koṭīśata caiva bhonti na ca te pimaṃ sūtra prakāśayanti //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.12_0: tasmācchrūṇitvā idamevarūpaṃ parikīrtitaṃ dharmu svayaṃ svayaṃbhūvā /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_19.12_1: ārāgayitvā ca punaḥ punaścimaṃ prakāśayet sūtra mayīha nirvṛte //
S04bsu036_u:413_0: atha khalu yāni tāni sāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pṛthivīvivarebhyo niṣkrāntāni,
S04bsu036_u:413_1_0: tāni sarvāṇi bhagavato 'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:413_1_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni yāni bhagavato
S04bsu036_u:413_4: arthino vayaṃ bhagavan anenaikavamudāreṇa dharmaparyāyeṇa dhāraṇāya vācanāya deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya vā likhanāya /
S04bsu036_u:414_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīpramukhāni bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau vāstavyāni,
S04bsu036_u:414_2: bahavaśca gaṅgānadīvālikopamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya addaṣṭenātmabhāvena,
S04bsu036_u:415_0_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ teṣāṃ paurvikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:415_0_1: gaṇināṃ mahāgaṇināṃ gaṇācāryāṇāmekaṃ pramukhaṃ viśiṣṭacāritraṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:415_0_2: mahāsattvaṃ mahāgaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryamāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu viśiṣṭacāritra /
S04bsu036_u:416_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ stūpamadhye /
S04bsu036_u:416_4: tābhyāṃ ca jihvendriyābhyāṃ bahūni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S04bsu036_u:416_5: tāsu ca raśmiṣvekaikasyā raśmerbahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ /
S04bsu036_u:416_6: suvarṇavarṇāḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:416_7: te ca bodhisattvā digvidikṣu lokadhātuśatasahasreṣu visṛtāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:416_9_0: yathaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ
S04bsu036_u:416_9_1: karoti prabhūtaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tathaiva te sarve tathāgatā
S04bsu036_u:416_10: ye te 'nyalokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo 'bhyāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭā jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu036_u:417_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ te ca sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tamṛddhayabhisaṃskāraṃ paripūrṇaṃ varśaśatasahasraṃ kṛtavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:417_1_0: atha khalu varṣaśatasahasrasyātyayena te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstāni
S04bsu036_u:417_1_1: jihvendriyāṇi punarevopasaṃhṛtya ekasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte samakālaṃ sarvairmahāsiṃhotkāsanaśabdaḥ
S04bsu036_u:417_3: tena ca mahotkāsanaśabdena mahācchaṭāsaṃghātaśabdena yāvanti daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:417_5: prakampitāni saṃprakampitāni calitāni pracalitāni saṃpracalitāni vedhitāni pravedhitāni saṃpravedhitāni /
S04bsu036_u:417_6: teṣu ca sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāvantaḥ sarvasattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:417_7: te 'pi sarve buddhānubhāvena tatrasthā evamimāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:417_8_0: tāni ca sarvatathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni
S04bsu036_u:417_8_1: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:417_8_2: prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ tasya mahāratnastūpasya
S04bsu036_u:417_8_3: madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena sārdhaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ tāśca
S04bsu036_u:417_9: dṛṣṭvā ca āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:417_10: evaṃ ca antarīkṣād ghoṣamaśrauṣuḥ - eṣa mārṣā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:417_12: sa etarhi saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S04bsu036_u:417_14: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskurudhvam /
S04bsu036_u:418_0_0: atha khalu te sarvasattvā imamevaṃrūpamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tatrasthā eva namo
S04bsu036_u:418_0_1: bhagavate śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣante sma añjaliṃ
S04bsu036_u:418_1: vividhāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyo yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātustena kṣipanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:418_2: nānavidhāni cābharaṇāni pindhāṇi hārārdhahāramaṇiratnānyapi kṣipanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:418_3: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe,
S04bsu036_u:418_5: tāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyastāni ca hārārdhahāramaṇiratnāni kṣiptāni imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:419_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānāmantrayāmāsa - acintyaprabhāvāḥ kulaputrāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:419_1: bahūnyapyahaṃ kulaputrāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi asya dharmaparyāyasya parīndanārthaṃ nānādharmapramukhairbahūnānuśaṃsān bhāṣeyam /
S04bsu036_u:419_2: na cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ pāraṃ gaccheyamasya dharmaparyāyasya bhāṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:419_3: saṃkṣepeṇa kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhavṛṣabhitā sarvabuddharahasyaṃ sarvabuddhagambhīrasthānaṃ mayā asmin dharmaparyāye deśitam /
S04bsu036_u:419_4: tasmāttarhi kulaputrā yuṣmābhistathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyo deśayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ prakāśayitavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:419_5_0: [Vaidya_231] yasmiṃśca kulaputrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśe ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo vācyeta vā prakāśyeta
S04bsu036_u:419_5_1: vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā cintyeta vā bhāṣyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā pustakagato vā tiṣṭhat
