S04bsu036_u:452_7: svakamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ kāyaṃ prajvālayāmāsa tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe,
S04bsu036_u:452_9_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña tasya sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya
S04bsu036_u:452_10: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣu aśītigaṅgānadīvālikāsamā eva buddhā bhagavantaste sarve sādhukāraṃ dadanti sma - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu036_u:452_12: ayaṃ sa bhūto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vīryārambhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:452_18: iyaṃ punaḥ kulaputra viśiṣṭā agrā varā pravarā praṇītā dharmapūjā,
S04bsu036_u:452_19: yo 'yamātmabhāvaparityāgaḥ / atha khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña te buddhā bhagavanta imāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīmabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:453_0: tasya khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvasattvapriyadarśanātmabhāvasya dīpyato dvādaśa varṣaśatānyatikrāntānyabhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:453_3_0: sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S04bsu036_u:453_3_1: evaṃrūpāṃ tathāgatapūjāṃ ca dharmapūjāṃ ca kṛtvā tataścyutastasyaiva bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:453_3_2: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane rājño vimaladattasya gṛhe [Vaidya_238] upapanna aupapādikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:453_5: samanantaropapannaśca khalu punaḥ sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātāpitarau gāthayādhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_22.1_0: ayaṃ mamā caṃkramu rājaśreṣṭha yasmin mayā sthitva samādhi labdhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_22.1_1: vīryaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ārabhitaṃ mahāvrataṃ parityajitvā priyamātmabhāvam //
S04bsu036_u:454_0_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S04bsu036_u:454_0_1: imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā svamātāpitarāvetadavocat - adyāpyamba tāta sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśrīstathāgato
S04bsu036_u:454_0_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu036_u:454_1: yasya mayā bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvarutakauśalyadhāraṇī pratilabdhā,
S04bsu036_u:454_2: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'śītibhirgāthākoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ kaṅkaraiśca vivaraiśca akṣobhyaiśca tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:454_3: sādhu amba tāta gamiṣyāmyahaṃ tasya bhagavato 'ntikam,
S04bsu036_u:454_4: tasmiṃśca gatvā bhūyastasya bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:454_5_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:454_5_1: velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya saptaratnamaye kūṭāgāre paryaṅkamābhujya
S04bsu036_u:454_6_0: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu036_u:454_6_1: yena sa bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtvā anayā gāthāyābhiṣṭauti
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_22.2_0: suvimalavadanā narendra dhīrā tava prabha rājatiyaṃ daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_22.2_1: tubhya sugata kṛtva agrapūjāṃ ahamiha āgatu nātha darśanāya //
S04bsu036_u:455_0_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:455_0_1: velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ candrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyaṃ saṃkusumitābhijña
S04bsu036_u:455_0_3: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - parinirvāṇakālasamayo me kulaputra anuprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:456_0_1: sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - idaṃ ca te kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:456_2: imāṃśca mahāśrāvakān, imāṃ ca buddhabodhim, imāṃ ca lokadhātum, imāni ca ratnavyomakāni, imāni ca ratnavṛkṣāṇi, imāṃśca devaputrān, mamopasthāyakānanuparindāmi /
S04bsu036_u:456_3: parinirvṛtasya ca me kulaputra ye dhātavastānanuparindāmi /
S04bsu036_u:456_4: ātmanā ca tvayā kulaputra mama dhātūnāṃ vipulā pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu036_u:456_7_2: tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:457_0_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ
S04bsu036_u:457_0_1: bhagavanta candrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyaṃ tathāgataṃ parinirvṛtaṃ viditvā uragasāracandanacittāṃ
S04bsu036_u:457_1: dagdhaṃ niśāntaṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvaṃ viditvā tato dhātūn gṛhītvā rodati krandati paridevate sma /
S04bsu036_u:457_2_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:457_2_1: ruditvā kranditvā paridevitvā saptaratnamayāni caturaśītikumbhasahasrāṇi kārayitvā
S04bsu036_u:457_2_2: teṣu tāṃstathāgatadhātūn prakṣipya saptaratnamayāni caturaśītistūpasahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu036_u:457_5: sa tān stūpān pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ cintayāmāsa - kṛtā mayā tasya bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasya dhātūnāṃ pūjā /
S04bsu036_u:457_6: ataśca bhūya uttari viśiṣṭatarāṃ tathāgatadhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:457_7_0: atha khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo
S04bsu036_u:457_8: tasya bhagavato dhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S04bsu036_u:457_9_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:457_10: ādīpya ca dvāsaptativarṣasahasrāṇi teṣāṃ tathāgatadhātustūpānāṃ pūjāmakarot /
S04bsu036_u:457_11: pūjāṃ ca kurvatā tasyāḥ parṣado 'saṃkhyeyāni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vinītāni /
S04bsu036_u:458_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:458_1_0: te ca sarve mahāśrāvakāḥ, taṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamaṅgahīnaṃ
S04bsu036_u:458_1_1: dṛṣṭvā aśrumukhā rudantaḥ krandantaḥ paridevamānāḥ parasparametadūcuḥ - ayaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśano
S04bsu036_u:458_3_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastān
S04bsu036_u:458_3_1: bodhisattvāṃstāṃśca mahāśrāvakāṃstāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - mā yūyaṃ kulaputrā
S04bsu036_u:458_4: mā [Vaidya_240] kradanta, mā paridevadhvam / eṣo 'haṃ kulaputrā ye keciddaśasu dikṣu anantāparyantāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S04bsu036_u:458_5: tān sarvān buddhān bhagavataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kṛtvā teṣāṃ purataḥ sattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ karomi,
S04bsu036_u:458_6: yena satyena satyavacanena svaṃ mama bāhuṃ tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe parityajya suvarṇavarṇo me kāyo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:458_7: tena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ mama bāhuryathāpaurāṇo bhavatu,
S04bsu036_u:458_10: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña samanantarakṛte 'smin satyādhiṣṭhāne tena sarvasattvapriyadarśanena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
S04bsu036_u:458_11: atha khalviyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā,
S04bsu036_u:458_13: tasya ca sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa bāhuryathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:458_14: yaduta tasyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānabalādhānena puṇyabalādhānena ca /
S04bsu036_u:458_15_0: syāt khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā
S04bsu036_u:458_15_1: - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:458_15_2: 'bhūt? na khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:458_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:458_17: iyanti nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi karoti,
S04bsu036_u:458_19_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣamāṇo yaḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:458_20: ekāṃ hastāṅguliṃ pādāṅguliṃ vā ekāṅgaṃ vā bāhumādīpayet,
S04bsu036_u:458_21: bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:458_22: na tveva rājyaparityāgānna priyaputraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgānna trisāhasramahāsāhasrīlokadhātoḥ savanasamudraparvatotsasarastaḍāgakūpārāmāyāḥ parityāgāt /
S04bsu036_u:458_23_1: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:458_24: sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvat puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S04bsu036_u:458_25: yāvat sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yaḥ itaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:458_27: na tvevaṃ imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadatastasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_0: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāmutsasarastaḍāgānāṃ mahāsamudro mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_1: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_2: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ kālaparvatānāṃ cakravālānāṃ mahācakravālānāṃ ca sumeruḥ parvatarājo mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_3: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña [Vaidya_241] ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ rājā mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_4: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramāḥ prabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_5: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaścandrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātirekaprabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_6: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu036_u:459_7: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvākuśalatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu036_u:459_8: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_9: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmindraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_10: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ rājā brahmaloke pitṛkāryaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:459_11_0: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_11_1: sattvānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_12: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvabālapṛthagjanānatikrāntaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaśca,
S04bsu036_u:459_13: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān sūtrāntānatikramya abhyudgato mūrdhaprāpto veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_15: mūrdhaprāptā veditavyāḥ, ye khalvimaṃ sūtrarājaṃ dhārayiṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:459_16: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvo 'gra ākhyāyate,
S04bsu036_u:459_17: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sutrāntānāmagra ākhyāyate /
S04bsu036_u:459_18: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tathāgato dharmarājaḥ paṭṭabaddhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_19: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastathāgatabhūto bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānām /
S04bsu036_u:459_20: trātā khalvapi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvabhayebhyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:459_21_0: vimocakaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ / taḍāga iva tṛṣitānāmagniriva śītārtānāṃ cailamiva nagnānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_21_1: sārthavāha iva vaṇijānāṃ māteva putrāṇāṃ nauriva pāragāmināṃ vaidya iva āturāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_21_2: dīpa iva tamondhakārāvṛtānāṃ ratnamiva dhanārthināṃ cakravartīva sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_22: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocakaḥ sarvavyādhicchedakaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayabandhanasaṃkaṭapramocakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_23: yena cāyaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:459_24: yaśca likhati, yaśca lekhayati, eṣāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña puṇyābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bauddhena jñānena na śakyaṃ paryanto 'dhigantum,
S04bsu036_u:459_25: yāvantaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:459_26_0: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā deśayitvā vā śrutvā vā likhitvā [Vaidya_242]
S04bsu036_u:459_26_1: vā pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākavaijayantībhirvādyavastrāñjalikarmabhirvā
S04bsu036_u:459_26_4: pūjābhiḥ satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ kuryāt pūjanāṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:459_28: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūvayogaparivartaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati śroṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:459_29: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña mātṛgrāma imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā udgahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:459_30_1: pañcāśatyāṃ śrutvā mātṛgrāmaḥ pratipatsyate sa khalvataścyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate
S04bsu036_u:459_31: sa tasyāṃ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upapatsyate /
S04bsu036_u:459_33: na dveṣo na moho na māno na mātsaryaṃ na krodho na vyāpādaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:459_36: anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvāsaptatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃstathāgatān drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:459_38: yena cakṣurindriyeṇa pariśuddhena tān buddhān bhagavato drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:459_39: te cāsya buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu036_u:459_40_0: yattvayā saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:459_40_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane uddiṣṭaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ bhāvitaṃ cintitaṃ manasi kṛtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:459_41: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyamagninā dagdhuṃ nodakena hartum /
S04bsu036_u:459_42: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyaṃ buddhasahesreṇāpi nirdeṣṭum /
S04bsu036_u:459_45: na tava kulaputra sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadṛśo vidyate tathāgatamekaṃ vinirmucya /
S04bsu036_u:459_46: nānyaḥ kaścicchrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā yastvāṃ śaktaḥ puṇyena vā prajñayā vā samādhinā vā abhibhavitum /
S04bsu036_u:459_47: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:460_0: yaḥ kaścinnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvā sādhukāramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu036_u:460_6: tasmāttarhi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña anuparindāmyahamimaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūrvayogaparivartam,
S04bsu036_u:460_7: yathā paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasmin jambudvīpe pracaret,
S04bsu036_u:460_8: nāntardhānaṃ gacchet, na ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet,
S04bsu036_u:460_9: na mārakāyikā devatāḥ, na nāgā na yakṣā na gandharvā na kumbhāṇḍā avatāraṃ labheyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:460_12: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vyādhiḥ kāye na kramiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:460_13: na jarā nākālamṛtyuḥ / sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paśyedevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣum,
S04bsu036_u:460_15: abhyavakīrya caivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam /
S04bsu036_u:460_21_1: vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam
S04bsu036_u:461_0: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:461_1: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña,
S04bsu036_u:462_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma dvāviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:466_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,
S04bsu036_u:466_1: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:466_2: tāni ca aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:466_3: tatra kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati vipulenāyuṣpramāṇena /
S04bsu036_u:466_4: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:466_5: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:466_6: sā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatyā ābhayā spharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:466_7: tasyāṃ khalu punarvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati sma avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:466_8: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:466_12: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:466_13: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ
S04bsu036_u:466_14_1: - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:467_0_1: samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvayā kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:467_1: sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra lokadhāturutkūlanikūlā [Vaidya_245] mṛnmayī kālaparvatākīrṇā gūthoḍillaparipūrṇā /
S04bsu036_u:467_2: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho hrasvakāyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:467_9: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre /
S04bsu036_u:468_1: yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati / gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatabalādhānena tathāgatavikrīḍitena tathāgatavyūhena tathāgatābhyudgatajñānena /
S04bsu036_u:468_2: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmanuccalita eva tasmād buddhakṣetrādanutthitaścaiva tasmādāsanāt tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S04bsu036_u:468_3_0: yasya samādheḥ samanantarasamāpannasya gadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya atha tāvadeveha
S04bsu036_u:468_3_1: sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gṛdhrakūṭe parvate tasya tathāgatadharmāsanasya purastāccaturaśītipadmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu036_u:469_0_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastaṃ padmavyūhaprādurbhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ
S04bsu036_u:469_0_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yenemāni
S04bsu036_u:469_0_3: padmakiṃśukavarṇāni? evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - eṣa mañjuśrīḥ
S04bsu036_u:469_0_6: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu036_u:469_2: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kastena bhagavan kulaputreṇa kuśalasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:469_3: yena sa kuśalasaṃbhāreṇa kṛtenopacitena ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ? katamasmiṃśca bhagavan samādhau sa bodhisattvaścarati? taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan samādhiṃ śṛṇuyāma,
S04bsu036_u:469_4: tatra ya vayaṃ bhagavan samādhau carema /
S04bsu036_u:469_5: taṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paśyema,
S04bsu036_u:469_7_0: kīdṛg rūpam, kīdṛg liṅgam, kīdṛkū saṃsthānam, ko 'syācāra iti / tatsādhu bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:469_7_1: karotu tathāgatastathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ yena nimittena saṃcoditaḥ samānaḥ sa bodhisattvo
S04bsu036_u:470_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ
S04bsu036_u:470_0_2: nimittaṃ yena [Vaidya_246] gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:470_1_0: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:470_1_1: velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ prāduścakāragadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S04bsu036_u:470_1_2: saṃcodanārtham - āgaccha kulaputra imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātum /
S04bsu036_u:470_3_0: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya
S04bsu036_u:470_3_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu036_u:470_7: śriyā jājvalyamānaḥ, tejasā dedīpyamānaḥ, lakṣaṇairvicitritagātro nārāyaṇasaṃhananakāyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:470_8: saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāramabhiruhya vaihāyase saptatālamātreṇa bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āgacchati sma /
S04bsu036_u:470_9: sa yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ, yena ca gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:470_10: upasaṃkramya tasmāt kūṭāgārādavatīrya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:470_11: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe niryātayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:470_12_1: bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati alpābādhatām ālpataṅkatāṃ
S04bsu036_u:470_13: evaṃ ca sa bhagavānavocat - kaccitte bhagavan kṣamaṇīyam,
S04bsu036_u:470_16_0: mā atīva rāgacaritāḥ, mā atīva dveṣacaritā mā atīva mohacaritā mā atīva bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:470_16_1: sattvā īrṣyālukā mā matsariṇo mā amātṛjñā mā apitṛjñā mā aśrāmaṇya mā abrāhmaṇyā
S04bsu036_u:470_16_2: mā mithyādṛṣṭyo mā adāntacittā mā aguptendriyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:470_18: kaccid bhagavan prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgato dharmaśravaṇāya saptaratnamaye stūpe madhyagataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:470_19: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tathāgatarmahantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sa bhagavān paripṛcchati - kaccidbhagavaṃstasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kṣamaṇīyam,
S04bsu036_u:470_20: kaccid yāpanīyam, kaccid bhagavan prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaściraṃ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:470_21: vayamapi bhagavaṃstasya prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahaṃ paśyema /
S04bsu036_u:470_22: tatsādhu bhagavān darśayatu tathāgatastasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahamiti /
S04bsu036_u:471_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ
S04bsu036_u:471_0_2: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:471_1: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu036_u:471_2: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭukāmo 'bhyāgataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:471_3: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāya śrāvaṇāya mañjuśriyaṃ ca kumārabhūtaṃ darśanāyeti /
S04bsu036_u:472_0: atha khalu padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S04bsu036_u:472_1_0: kasya vā tathāgatasyāntike? atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S04bsu036_u:472_1_1: padmaśriyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani
S04bsu036_u:472_1_2: asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule aprameye apramāṇe yadāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:472_2_0: tena kālena tena samayena meghadundubhisvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu036_u:472_2_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S04bsu036_u:472_2_2: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān sarvarūpasaṃdarśanāyāṃ lokadhātau priyadarśane
S04bsu036_u:472_3_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:472_5: tatra kulaputra meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasya pravacane gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyamīdṛśī śrīḥ prāptā /
S04bsu036_u:472_6: syāt khalu punaste kulaputra kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:472_7: yena sā tasya bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
S04bsu036_u:472_8: tāni caturaśītibhājanasahasrāṇi dattāni? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:472_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayameva sa kulaputra gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:472_10: yena sā tasya bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
S04bsu036_u:472_12: evaṃ bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ kulaputra gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kṛtabuddhaparikarmā /
S04bsu036_u:472_13: dṛṣṭapūrvāścānena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:472_14: paśyasi tvaṃ padmaśrīretaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam? padmaśrīrāha - paśyāmi bhagavan,
S04bsu036_u:472_15: paśyāmi sugata / bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu punaḥ padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahubhī rūpairimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:472_17_0: kvacid rūdrarūpeṇa, kvacicchakrarūpeṇa, kvacidīśvararūpeṇa, kvacit senāpatirūpeṇa,
S04bsu036_u:472_17_1: kvacid vaiśravaṇarūpeṇa, kvaciccakravartirūpeṇa, kvacit koṭṭarājarūpeṇa, kvacicchreṣṭhirūpeṇa,
S04bsu036_u:472_17_2: kvacid gṛhapatirūpeṇa, kvacinnaigamarūpeṇa, kvacid brāhmaṇarūpeṇa imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
S04bsu036_u:472_18: kvacid bhikṣurūpeṇa, kvacid bhikṣuṇīrūpeṇa, kvacidupāsakarūpeṇa, kvacidupāsikārūpeṇa kvacicchreṣṭhibhāryārūpeṇa,
S04bsu036_u:472_19_1: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:472_20: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra rūpasaṃdarśanairgadgadasvaro bodhisatvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:472_21: yāvat keṣāṃcid yakṣarūpeṇa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:472_22_0: keṣāṃcit surarūpeṇa, keṣāṃcid garūḍarūpeṇa, keṣāṃcit kinnararūpeṇa, keṣāṃcinmahoragarūpeṇa
S04bsu036_u:472_22_1: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:472_23: yāvannirayatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇopapannānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayaṃstrātā bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:472_24: yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ strīrūpamabhinirmāya ima saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:472_25: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:472_26: trātā khalvapi padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannānāṃ sattvānām /
S04bsu036_u:472_27: tasyāṃ ca sahāyāṃ lokadhātāveva sa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyadbhī rūpanimittairimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:472_29: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra jñānāvabhāsairgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāyate /
S04bsu036_u:472_37: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ khalu punaḥ padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:473_0: atha khalu padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - avaropitakuśalamūlo 'yaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:473_1_0: katama eṣa bhagavan samādhiryasmin samādhāvavasthitena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena
S04bsu036_u:473_1_1: mahāsattvena iyantaḥ sattvā vinītā iti? evamukte bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu036_u:473_1_2: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padmaśriyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - eṣa hi kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:473_2: asmin samādhāvavasthitena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamaprameyaḥ sattvārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:474_0_0: asmin khalu punargadgadasvaraparivarte nirdiśyamāne yāni gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena
S04bsu036_u:474_2: asyāṃ ca sahāyāṃ lokadhātau [Vaidya_249] gaṇanāsamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ sarvarūpasaṃdarśanasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:475_0_0: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:475_0_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasya ca bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu036_u:475_0_2: dhātustūpe vipulāṃ vistīrṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā punarapi saptaratnamaye kūṭāgāre 'bhiruhya
S04bsu036_u:475_1: samabhigamya ca taṃ bhagavantaṃ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - kṛto me bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvārthaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:475_2: tasya ca bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātustūpo dṛṣṭaḥ vanditaśca /
S04bsu036_u:475_3: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato dṛṣṭo vanditaśca /
S04bsu036_u:475_5: sa ca bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryabalabegaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:475_6: sa ca pradānaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:475_7: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ caturaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarūpasaṃdarśanasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:476_0: asmin khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gamanāgamanaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe dvācatvāriṃśatāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:476_1: padmaśriyaśca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:477_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye gadgadasvaraparivarto nāma trayoviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:481_0_0: atha khalu akṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:481_0_1: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:481_0_2: - kena kāraṇena bhagavan avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvara ityucyate?
S04bsu036_u:481_0_3: evamukte bhagavānakṣayamatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha kulaputra yāvanti
S04bsu036_u:481_1: tāni sacedavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:481_3: ye ca kulaputra sattvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:481_5: sarve te avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā tasmānmahato 'gniskandhāt parimucyeran /
S04bsu036_u:481_6: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sattvā nadībhiruhyamānā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:481_8_0: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sāgaramadhye vahanābhirūḍhānāṃ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:481_8_2: kṛtanidhīnāṃ sa potasteṣāṃ kālikāvātena rākṣasīdvīpe kṣiptaḥ syāt,
S04bsu036_u:481_9: tasmiṃśca kaścidevaikaḥ sattvaḥ syāt yo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:481_11: anena khalu punaḥ kulaputra kāraṇena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvara iti saṃjñāyate /
S04bsu036_u:482_0: sacet kulaputra kaścideva vadhyotsṛṣṭo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:482_2: sacet khalu punaḥ kulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturyakṣarākṣasaiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:482_3: te 'valokiteśvarasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena duṣṭacittā draṣṭumapyaśaktāḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:482_4: sacetkhalu punaḥ kulaputra kaścideva sattvo dārvāyasmayairhaḍinigaḍabandhanairbaddho bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:482_5: aparādhyanaparādhī vā, tasyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena kṣipraṃ tāni haḍinigaḍabandhanāni vivaramanuprayacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:482_6: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:483_0: sacetkulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturdhūrtairamitraiścauraiśca śastrapāṇibhiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:483_1: tasmiṃścaikaḥ sārthavāho mahāntaṃ sārthaṃ ratnāḍhyamanardhyaṃ gṛhītvā gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:483_2: te gacchantastāṃścaurān dhūrtān śatrūṃśca śastrahastān paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:483_4: sa ca sārthavāhastaṃ sārthamevaṃ brūyāt - mā bhaiṣṭa kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:483_5: mā bhaiṣṭa, abhayaṃdadamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamekasvareṇa sarve samākrandadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:483_7: atha khalu sarva eva sa sārthaḥ ekasvareṇa avalokiteśvaramākrandet - namo namastasmai abhayaṃdadāyāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāyeti [Vaidya_251]/
S04bsu036_u:483_8: sahanāmagrahaṇenaiva sa sārthaḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimukto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:483_9: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:484_1: te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatarāgā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:484_2: ye dveṣacaritāḥ sattvāḥ, te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatadveṣā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:484_3: ye mohacaritāḥ sattvāḥ, te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatamohā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:484_4: evaṃ maharddhikaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:485_0: yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya putrakāmo mātṛgrāmo namaskāraṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:485_1: tasya putraḥ prajāyate abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:485_3_0: yo dārikāmabhinandati, tasya dārikā prajāyate abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā
S04bsu036_u:485_3_1: śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatā dārikā - lakṣaṇasamanvāgatā bahujanapriyā manāpā
S04bsu036_u:485_4: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:485_5: ye ca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:485_6: nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayiṣyanti, teṣāmamoghaphalaṃ bhavati / yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:485_7: nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayiṣyati, yaśca dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ namaskāraṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:485_8: nāmadheyāni ca dhārayet, yaśca tāvatāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:485_9_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kiyantaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ
S04bsu036_u:485_9_1: prasavet? evamukte akṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bahu
S04bsu036_u:485_10: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahuṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavet /
S04bsu036_u:485_11: bhagavānāha - yaśca kulaputra tāvatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvā puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:485_12: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antaśa ekamapi namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:485_14: yaśca teṣāṃ dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyāni ca dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:485_15: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:485_16: etāvubhau puṇyaskandhau na sukarau kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi /
S04bsu036_u:485_17: evamaprameyaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadhāraṇāt puṇyam /
S04bsu036_u:486_0_0: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:486_0_1: avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pravicarati? kathaṃ
S04bsu036_u:486_0_2: sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati? kīdṛśaścāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaviṣayaḥ?
S04bsu036_u:486_0_3: evamukte bhagavānakṣayamatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - santi kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:486_1: santi lokadhātavaḥ, yeṣvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvarūpeṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_2: keṣāṃcit pratyekabuddharūpeṇa avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_3: keṣāṃcicchrāvakarūpeṇa avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_4: keṣāṃcid brahmarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_6: keṣāṃcid gandharvarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_7: keṣāṃcid gandharvarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:486_18: tasmāttarhi kulaputra avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:486_19: eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhītānāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ dadāti /
S04bsu036_u:486_20: anena kāraṇena abhayaṃdada iti saṃjñāyate iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:487_0: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - dāsyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dharmaprābhṛtaṃ dharmācchādam /
S04bsu036_u:487_2_2: sma - pratīccha satpuruṣa imaṃ dharmācchādaṃ mamāntikāt /
S04bsu036_u:487_3_0: sa na pratīcchati sma / atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvaraṃ
S04bsu036_u:487_3_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pratigṛhāṇa tvaṃ kulaputra imaṃ muktāhāramasmākamanukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:487_4_1: taṃ muktāhāraṃ pratigṛhṇāti sma akṣayamaterbodhisattvasya mahasattvasyānukampāmupādāya,
S04bsu036_u:487_5: tāsāṃ ca catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ teṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāmanukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:487_7: kṛtvā caikaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ bhagavate śākyamunaye dadāti sma,
S04bsu036_u:487_8: dvitīyaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpe samupanāmayāyāsa /
S04bsu036_u:487_9: īdṛśyā kulaputra vikurvayā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuvicarati /
S04bsu036_u:488_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.1_2: kenā jinaputra hetunā ucyate hi avalokiteśvaraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.2_0: atha sa diśatā vilokiyā praṇidhīsāgaru akṣayomati /

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.12_0: mantrā bala vidya oṣadhī bhūta vetāla śarīranāśakā /

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.13_1: smarato avalokiteśvaraṃ romakūpa na prabhonti hiṃsitum //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.14_1: smarato avalokiteśvaraṃ kṣipra gacchanti diśā anantataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.15_1: smarato avalokiteśvaraṃ kṣiprameva te bhonti nirviṣāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.17_1: śubhajñānabalo vilokiyā tena trātaru gaje sadevake //

S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.19_0: ye ca akṣaṇadurgatī bhayā narakatiryagyamasya śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:490_0: atha khalu akṣamatirhṛṣṭatuṣṭamanā imā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.22_1: kleśāgni śamesi prāṇināṃ dharmavarṣaṃ amṛtaṃ pravarṣasi //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_24.25_0: smarathā smarathā sa kāṅkṣathā śuddhasattvaṃ avalokiteśvaram /

S04bsu036_u:493_0_1: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:493_0_2: - na te bhagavan sattvāḥ avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:494_0: asmin khalu punaḥ samantamukhaparivarte bhagavatā nirdeśyamāne tasyāḥ parṣadaścaturaśītināṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmasamasamāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:499_0: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayāmāsa - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairyadāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:499_1: tena kālena tena samayena jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
S04bsu036_u:499_2: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān priyadarśane kalpe vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:499_3: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya pravacane śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:499_4: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya vimaladattā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:499_5: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya dvau putrāvabhūtām - eko vimalagarbho nāma,
S04bsu036_u:499_6: dvitīyo vimalanetro nāma / tau ca dvau dārakāvṛddhimantau cābhūtām,
S04bsu036_u:499_7: prajñāvantau ca puṇyavantau ca jñānavantau ca bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ ca abhiyuktāvabhūtām /
S04bsu036_u:499_9_1: maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāmupekṣāyāṃ yāvat saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu /
S04bsu036_u:499_16: sa ca bhagavāṃstena kālena tena samayena imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayāmāsa teṣāṃ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
S04bsu036_u:499_18: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako yena svamātā janayitrī,
S04bsu036_u:499_20_0: paryupāsanāya / tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa hyamba sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato
S04bsu036_u:499_20_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:499_21_0: taṃ śravaṇāya gamiṣyāvaḥ / evamukte kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā vimalagarbhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:499_21_1: dārakaṃ vimalanetraṃ ca dārakametadavocat - eṣa khalu kulaputrau yuvayoḥ pitā rājā
S04bsu036_u:499_23_0: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako daśanakhamañjaliṃ
S04bsu036_u:499_23_1: pragṛhya tāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - mithyādṛṣṭikule 'sminnāvāṃ jātau?
S04bsu036_u:499_24: atha khalu kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā tau dvau dārakāvetadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputrau [Vaidya_259]/
S04bsu036_u:499_25: yuvāṃ tasya svapitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai kiṃcideva prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayatam /
S04bsu036_u:499_27: prasannacittaśca asmākamanujānīyāt tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhigantum /
S04bsu036_u:500_0_0: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ
S04bsu036_u:500_0_1: vaihāyasamabhyudgamya tasya pitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai buddhānujñātāni yamakāni
S04bsu036_u:500_8: tau tasminnevākāśe mahāntau bhūtvā khuḍḍakau bhavataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:500_12: iyadbhiḥ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā ṛddhiprātihāryaistābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sa śubhavyūho rājā svapitā vinītaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:500_13_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastayordārakayostamṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S04bsu036_u:500_13_1: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto daśanakhamañjaliṃ
S04bsu036_u:500_13_2: pragṛhya tau dārakāvetadavocat - ko yuvayoḥ kulaputrau śāstā,
S04bsu036_u:500_14_0: kasya vā yuvāṃ śiṣyāviti? atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau taṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:500_14_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati ratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:500_15: sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
S04bsu036_u:500_16: sa āvayorbhagavān śāstā / tasyāvāṃ mahārāja śiṣyau / atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastau dārakāvetadavocat - paśyāmo vayaṃ kulaputrau taṃ yuvayoḥ śāstāram /
S04bsu036_u:501_0: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau tato 'ntarīkṣādavatīrya yena svamātā janayitrī tenopasaṃkrāmatām /
S04bsu036_u:501_1: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - eṣa āvābhyāmamba vinītaḥ svapitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:501_3: tadidānīmutsraṣṭumarhasi / āvāṃ tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe pravrajiṣyāva iti /
S04bsu036_u:502_0: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣatām -
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_25.1_1: āvāṃ vai pravrajiṣyāvo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:saddhp_25.3_1: vayaṃ pi pravrajiṣyāmo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:505_0: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakāvime gāthe bhāṣitvā tau mātāpitarāvetadavocatām - sādhu amba tāta eta /
S04bsu036_u:505_1: vayaṃ sarve sahitā bhūtvā gamiṣyāmastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam /
S04bsu036_u:505_2: upasaṃkramiṣyāmastaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu036_u:505_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? durlabho hyamba tāta buddhotpādaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:505_6: tasmāttarhi amba tāta paramapuṇyopastabdhā vayamīdṛśe pravacane upapannāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:505_8: āvāṃ gamiṣyāvaḥ / tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:505_9: durlabhaṃ hi amba tāta tathāgatānāṃ darśanam /
S04bsu036_u:505_10: durlabho hyadya kālaḥ / īdṛśo dharmarājā / paramadurlabhedṛśī kṣaṇasaṃpat /
S04bsu036_u:506_0: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ samayena tasya rājñaḥ śūbhavyūhasya antaḥpurāccaturaśītirantaḥpurikāsahasrāṇi asya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya bhājanabhutānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:506_2: vimalagarbhaśca dārako bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasattvapāpajahane samādhau carito 'bhūt kimiti sarvasattvāḥ sarvapāpaṃ jaheyuriti /
S04bsu036_u:506_3: sā ca tayordārakayormātā vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvabuddhasaṃgītiṃ sarvabuddhadharmaguhyasthānāni ca saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu036_u:506_4: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ tathāgataśāsane vinītaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:506_6_0: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya
S04bsu036_u:506_6_1: putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ
S04bsu036_u:506_7: tenopasaṃkrāman / upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:507_0_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā
S04bsu036_u:507_1_0: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu
S04bsu036_u:507_1_1: ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ [Vaidya_261] saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:507_1_2: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā
S04bsu036_u:507_3: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:507_4_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:507_5: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan /
S04bsu036_u:507_6: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma /
S04bsu036_u:508_0_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
S04bsu036_u:508_0_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau
S04bsu036_u:508_4: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,
S04bsu036_u:509_0: evamukte bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat - evametanmahārāja,
S04bsu036_u:509_1: evametad yathā vadasi / avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:509_5: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau? āha - paśyāmi bhagavan,
S04bsu036_u:509_6: paśyāmi sugata / bhagavānāha - etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānḥṃ tathḥgatḥnḥmarhatḥṃ samyaksaṃbuddhḥnḥmantike pūjḥṃ kariṣyataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:509_7: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ dhḥrayiṣyataḥ sattvḥnḥmanukampḥyai,
S04bsu036_u:510_0_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ
S04bsu036_u:510_1: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ - kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,
S04bsu036_u:510_2: vimalanetraśca bhagavān, bhruvormadhye corṇā vibhāti śaśiśaṅkhapāṇḍarābhā,
S04bsu036_u:510_3: sā ca samasahitā dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati,
S04bsu036_u:511_0_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
S04bsu036_u:511_3: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:511_6: na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:511_7: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato 'ntikamupasaṃkramitum /
S04bsu036_u:511_8: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt /
S04bsu036_u:512_0: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe 'kṣaipsīt /
S04bsu036_u:512_1: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:512_3: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu036_u:512_4: atha khalu rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyaitadabhavat - mahānubhāvamidaṃ buddhajñānam,
S04bsu036_u:512_6: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:513_0_1: parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ
S04bsu036_u:513_1: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:513_2: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:513_4: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:513_5: aprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ / samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:513_7_0: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa
S04bsu036_u:513_7_1: tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt? na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ
S04bsu036_u:513_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut /
S04bsu036_u:513_9_0: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyā sā tena
S04bsu036_u:513_9_1: kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma [Vaidya_263] rājabhāryābhūt? na khalu punaḥ
S04bsu036_u:513_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut /
S04bsu036_u:513_11: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:513_12: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām? na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:513_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām /
S04bsu036_u:513_14: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
S04bsu036_u:513_18: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena /
S04bsu036_u:514_0: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
S04bsu036_u:515_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:519_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ
S04bsu036_u:519_0_1: sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prakampadbhiḥ kṣetrai pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ pravādyamānaistūryakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:519_1_0: mahatā bodhisattvānubhāvena mahatyā bodhisattvavikurvayā mahatyā bodhisattvaddharyā
S04bsu036_u:519_1_1: mahata bodhisattvamāhātmyena mahatā bodhisattvasamāhitena mahatā bodhisattvatejasā
S04bsu036_u:519_3_1: puraskṛtaḥ evamacintyairṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
S04bsu036_u:519_4: sa yenagṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājaḥ yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:519_5_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:519_5_1: - ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bhagavato ratnatejobhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādihāgataḥ
S04bsu036_u:519_5_2: iha bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo deśyata iti /
S04bsu036_u:519_7: amūni ca bhagavannetāvanti bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāyāgatāni /
S04bsu036_u:519_8: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍārīkaṃ dharmaparyāyameṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa /
S04bsu036_u:519_9: evamukte bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - uddhaṭitajñā hi kulaputra ete bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:519_10: api tvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo yaduta asaṃbhinnatathatā /
S04bsu036_u:519_12: evametatsugata / atha khalu yāstasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāśca saṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:519_13_0: tāsāṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ punarapi bhagavān samantabhadraṃ
S04bsu036_u:519_13_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya
S04bsu036_u:519_13_2: mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:519_19: ebhiḥ kulaputra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:520_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:520_0_1: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:520_1: svastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍaparihāraṃ kariṣyāmi, viṣadūṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmi, yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate /
S04bsu036_u:520_2: na māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:520_3: na māraputrā na mārakāyikā devaputrā na mārakanyā na mārapārṣadyā yāvanna bhūyo māraparyutthito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:520_4: na devaputrā na yakṣā na pretā na pūtanā na kṛtyā na vetālāstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S04bsu036_u:520_5: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasya satatasamitaṃ nityakālaṃ rakṣāṃ [Vaidya_265] kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:520_6: yadā ca sa dharmabhāṇako 'smin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktaścaṃkramābhirūḍho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:520_7_0: tadāhaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike śvetaṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya tasya
S04bsu036_u:520_8: yadā punastasya dharmabhāṇakasya asmin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktasya sataḥ ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaḥ padavyañjanaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:520_9: tadāhaṃ tasmin śvetaṣaḍdante gajarāje 'bhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya saṃmukhamupadarśayitvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ pratyuccārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:520_10_0: sa ca dharmabhāṇako mamātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā imaṃ ca dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ mamāntikācchrutvā
S04bsu036_u:520_10_1: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye
S04bsu036_u:520_11: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:521_0_0: ye ca bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhikṣavo vā bhikṣūṇyo
S04bsu036_u:521_0_1: vā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakā evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakā evaṃ sūtrāntamārgakā
S04bsu036_u:521_0_2: evaṃ sūtrāntavācakā ye paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāmasmin dharmaparyāye
S04bsu036_u:521_2: tameva śvetaṃ ṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ ekaviṃśatime divase teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ caṃkramamāgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:521_3: āgatya ca tān dharmabhāṇakān parisaṃharṣayiṣyāmi samādāpayiṣyāmi samuttejayiṣyāmi saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:521_4: dhāraṇīṃ caiṣāṃ dāsyāmi, yathā te dharmabhāṇakā na kenaciddharṣaṇīyā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:521_5: na caiṣāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ lapsyante,
S04bsu036_u:521_7: rakṣāṃ caiṣāṃ kariṣyāmi, svastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍaparihāraṃ kariṣyāmi, viṣadūṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmi / teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan dharmabhāṇakānāmimāni dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:522_0_0: adaṇḍe daṇḍapati daṇḍāvartani daṇḍakuśale daṇḍasudhāri sudhārapati buddhapaśyane
S04bsu036_u:522_0_1: sarvadhāraṇi āvartani saṃvartani saṃghaparīkṣite saṃghanirghātani dharmaparīkṣite
S04bsu036_u:522_0_2: sarvasattvarutakauśalyānugate siṃhavikrīḍite anuvarte vartani vartāli svāhā /
S04bsu036_u:523_0: imāni tāni bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyasyāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:524_0: ayaṃ ca bhagavan saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracaramāṇo yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:524_1_0: tairbhagavan dharmabhāṇakairevaṃ veditavyam - samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānubhāvena
S04bsu036_u:524_1_1: yadasmākamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S04bsu036_u:524_2: samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya [Vaidya_266] mahāsattvasya caryāyāste bhagavan sattvā lābhino bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:524_7: ya idaṃ sūtraṃ likhisyanti, ye ca asyārthamanubhotsyante,
S04bsu036_u:524_8: likhitvā ca te bhagavannidaṃ sūtramitaścyutvā trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāya upapatsyante,
S04bsu036_u:524_10: bherīmātreṇa mukuṭena te devaputrāstāsāmapsarasāṃ madhye sthāsyanti /
S04bsu036_u:524_11: īdṛśaḥ kulaputrā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:524_12: kaḥ punarvādo ye etamuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:524_13: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo likhitavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:524_14: sarvadetaḥ samanvāhṛtya / yaśca avikṣiptena manasikāreṇa likhiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:524_21: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ paṇḍitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ satkṛtya likhitavyaḥ satkṛtyoddeṣṭavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:524_22: satkṛtya svādhyāyitavyaḥ, satkṛtya manasikartavyaḥ / imaṃ kulaputrā dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā uddiśya svādhyāyitvā bhāvayitvā manasikṛtvā evamaprameyā guṇā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:524_23: tasmāttarhi tena paṇḍitena bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:524_26: yathā bhagavan mamādhiṣṭhānena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracariṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:525_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samantabhadrāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu samantabhadra,
S04bsu036_u:525_1: yatra hi nāma tvamevaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya pratipannaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:525_5: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:525_7: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikācchrutaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:525_10: anumoditaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhaviṣyati śākyamuninā ca tathāgatena teṣāṃ mūrdhni pāṇiḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:525_12: tathāgataśāsanaparigrāhakāśca te samantabhadra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro [Vaidya_267] vā veditavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:525_15: na nṛttakā na mallā na nartakā na śauṇḍikaurabhrikakaukkuṭikasaukarikastrīpoṣakāḥ sattvāsteṣāmabhirucitā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:525_16: īdṛśāṃśca sūtrāntān śrutvā likhitvā dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā na teṣāmanyadabhirucitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:525_22: na teṣāṃ rāgo vyābādhiṣyati, na dveṣo na moho nerṣyā na mātsaryaṃ na mrakṣo na māno nādhimāno na mithyāmānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:525_24: yaḥ samantabhadra paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ paśyet,
S04bsu036_u:525_32: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:525_38: ya evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mohaṃ dāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:525_41: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme kāyaścitro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:525_44: varaladantāśca bhaviṣyanti, bībhatsoṣṭhāśca bhaviṣyanti, cipiṭanāsāśca bhaviṣyanti, viparītahastapādāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:525_48: ye īdṛśānāṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāṃ sūtrāntavācakānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ ca sūtrāntadeśakānāṃ ca apriyāṃ vācaṃ bhūtāmabhūtāṃ vā saṃśrāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:525_50: tasmāttarhi samantabhadra asya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dūrata eva pratyutthātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:525_52: tathā teṣāmeva sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāmevaṃ gauravaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu036_u:526_0: asmin khalu punaḥ samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarte nirdiśyamāne gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:527_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:531_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt
S04bsu036_u:531_0_1: sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena
S04bsu036_u:531_0_3: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi /
S04bsu036_u:531_3_0: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat
S04bsu036_u:531_3_2: yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami /
S04bsu036_u:531_4: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā /
S04bsu036_u:531_6: amātsaryo 'haṃ kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā,
S04bsu036_u:531_10: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:531_11: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste 'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:531_12: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:532_0: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:532_1_0: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:532_1_1: praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa
S04bsu036_u:532_1_2: bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - tathā bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:532_4: dvaitīyakamapi, traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī /
S04bsu036_u:532_5: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:533_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:533_1: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma - yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:533_2: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:534_1: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:534_2: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:534_3: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo 'bhyudgatāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:534_4: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:535_0: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye 'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:536_1: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu036_u:536_2: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
